5400.name: The Entrance To The Dancing Daemon Inn
5400.description:
The passage opens in an entrance foyer to the Dancing Daemon Inn. Chrome
plated stairs spiral up to the reception area. To the south you hear the
sounds of merriment and drinking and from the west you hear the bustling
activity of New Thalos. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

south.description: You see people dancing and drinking.

west.description: You see people walking by on Sultan's Walk.

up.description: The spiral stairs lead up to the reception area.

5401.name: The Reception Area
5401.description:
The area is now standing in the reception of New Thalos. A huge mahogany
desk is here along with two sofas and a coffee table covered in
magazines. The plush carpeting under your feet is a nice change from the
rugged paths you are used to travelling. A chrome stairway spirals
downstairs to the tavern of the Dancing Daemon Inn, and your future
adventures in New Thalos. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Dust motes
drift in the stale air.

down.description: The stairs lead down to the Daemon.

5402.name: The Dancing Daemon Inn
5402.description:
A huge circling wet-bar takes up most of the east end of the Daemon. An
old mage reclines against the mirror behind the bar absentmindedly
pouring several drinks at once with his refined telekinesis. The
Lokettes, a local band, are playing their usual gig on the stage. The
large booths along the all are filled with people drinking and having a
grand time. You feel like partying here. The only obvious exit is to the
north. Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

north.description: You see the entrance to the Daemon.

5403.name: The Medina
5403.description:
The area opens on the Medina, on the larger open areas in New Thalos.
People walk to and fro carrying on their day to day business. The Common
Square of the people opens up to the south and the Medina continues
north. The sounds of city life echo around. The cobblestones are worn
smooth by countless feet.

north.description: You see Medina.

south.description: You see the Common Square.

5404.name: The Medina
5404.description:
A path winds along a wide open expanse of road connecting Market Square
to the Common Square. Panhandlers, beggars, and other such riff- raff
wander about hoping to catch those few who with open hearts. The Medina
continues to the south and the Market Square spreads out to the north.
The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: You see Market Square.

south.description: You see the Medina.

5405.name: Southern Market Square
5405.description:
The large square of markets fills your vision. Strange sights and
sounds, those known only to the New Thalos market, barrage your senses.
The only hope of making any sense of what is going on here is to wander
around. Market Square continues north, west, and east, with the Medina
trailing off th the south. Buildings crowd together on all sides. The
smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Center Of Market Square

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Southeastern Market Square

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Medina

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Southwestern Market Square

5406.name: The Center Of Market Square
5406.description:
This is the center of Market Square, the famous square of New Thalos. A
large, peculiar looking statue is standing in the middle of the square.
The square extends in every direction. Buildings crowd together on all
sides. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Northern Market Square

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Eastern Market Square

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Southern Market Square

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Western Market Square

5407.name: Southeastern Market Square
5407.description:
In this corner of the market some of the largest warriors in the land
tower over you. It is easy to understand why they hang out here once you
notice the weapon shop and the armoury close by. Perhaps you might stop
in and take a look at the wares these shops have to offer. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past. The sounds of city life echo around.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Eastern Market Square

east.description: A passage leads to Abdul's Armour

south.description: A passage leads to Igor's Implements Of Destruction

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Southern Market Square

5408.name: Southwestern Market Square
5408.description:
This area of the market seems relatively quiet, save the high pitch
banter of the shopkeepers attempting to lure you into their stores.
South you see the bread stand and west is the entrance to the general
store. The market's sprawl continues east and north of here. Buildings
crowd together on all sides. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Western Market Square

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Southern Market Square

south.description: You see the grocer's.

west.description: You see the general store.

5409.name: Western Market Square
5409.description:
This area of the square seems a bit more subdued than the rest. You
notice that most of the outland adventurers mill around the southern end
of the market, while the townfolk seem to keep their business in the
northern end. West Main street begins here and heads for the gate, the
market's expanse fills the other directions. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Northwestern Market Square

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Center Of Market Square

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Southwestern Market Square

west.description: The cobblestones lead to West Main Street

5410.name: The Common Square
5410.description:
People pass by talking to each other, or rest their weary bones on this
grassy field. You can hear faint sounds of the river to the to the south
as it passes through the city. Ishtar drive heads east and west from
here and the Medina is to the north. South lies the River Ishtar Bridge
and the southern gate. The sounds of city life echo around. The smell of
smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: You see the medina.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to East Ishtar Drive

south.description: You see the bridge over the river.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to West Ishtar Drive

5411.name: Outside The Southern Gate Of New Thalos
5411.description:
You see before the expanse of the Great Eastern Desert. You have
heard many tales of the Great Pyramid, the lost city of Old Thalos and
the friendly brass dragon that lies under the desert. To the south lies
the desert and the city of New Thalos is to the north. The smell of
smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The sounds of city life echo around
you.

north.description: Inside The South Gate Of New Thalos

south.description: An open path leads to The Great Eastern Desert

5412.name: The Southern Bridge
5412.description:
Walking over the bridge you see the rushing waters of the River Ishtar.
To the south you see the Southern Gate of New Thalos and the Common
Square stretches out to the north Buildings crowd together on all sides.
The sounds of city life echo around.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Common Square

south.description: Inside The South Gate Of New Thalos

down.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5413.name: Inside The South Gate Of New Thalos
5413.description:
Two large stone towers rise up to greet you with the massive iron gate
swinging on ornately crafted hinges and emblazoned with the crest of New
Thalos. The makers of the city spared no expense in rebuilding the
defenses or their home. The River Ishtar bridge lies to the north and
the desert to the south. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless
feet. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Southern Bridge

south.description: Outside The Southern Gate Of New Thalos

5414.name: Northwestern Market Square
5414.description:
This corner of the market contains some of the most civilized folk in
New Thalos. To the north lies the humble store of the merchant Ahkeem,
his weavings known to be the best in the city. West of here is the
entrance to the First Royal Bank of New Thalos. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: A passage leads to Ahkeem's Stuff

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Northern Market Square

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Western Market Square

west.description: A passage leads to The Bank

5415.name: Northern Market Square
5415.description:
The area opens in one of the most heavily used parts of town. To the
north lies the Palace of New Thalos and the Casbah, east west and south
of here the busy market thrives with life. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Sultan's Walk

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Northeastern Market Square

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Center Of Market Square

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Northwestern Market Square

5416.name: Northeastern Market Square
5416.description:
Pandemonium. Chaos. Madness. A few other choice words come to mind as
you gaze into this corner of the market. The vegetable stand seems quiet
enough so you have to assume the noise comes from the Butchery. You have
to think for a while before muster the will to enter this shop. The
market continues to the south and west. Buildings crowd together on all
sides. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: A passage leads to Vera's Veggies

east.description: A passage leads to The Butchery

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Eastern Market Square

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Northern Market Square

5417.name: Eastern Market Square
5417.description:
The area opens in the market of New Thalos, the gem of the desert. The
market is the hub of the city, all trade and commerce of any
significance is carried on here. The market spreads out in all
directions save east, here Main Street heads for the easter gate. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. The smell of smoke and
humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Northeastern Market Square

east.description: The cobblestones lead to East Main Street

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Southeastern Market Square

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Center Of Market Square

5418.name: Sultan's Walk
5418.description:
This cobblestone road aides your journey through town. Traveling north
will take you by the Palace and the Dancing Daemon Inn, and south will
put you on Market Square. Buildings crowd together on all sides. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Sultan's Walk

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Northern Market Square

5419.name: Sultan's Walk
5419.description:
This part of the road travels between one of the sturdy walls of the
Palace and the Dancing Daemon. To the east you peer through a small
window into the Daemon, seeing many people dancing and drinking. After
you tend to your other chores you plan on visiting the Daemon. The walk
continues north and south from here. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Sultan's Walk

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Sultan's Walk

5420.name: Sultan's Walk
5420.description:
The road here between the Palace and the Dancing Daemon Inn seems well
worn by the travel of horses, carts, and leather boots. From the west
you hear the faint sound of trumpets announcing the arrival of some duke
or duchess to the Palace. Safe haven awaits you to the east in the halls
of the Daemon, and Sultan's Walk continues north and south. The sounds
of city life echo around. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Sultan's Walk

east.description: A passage leads to The Entrance To The Dancing Daemon Inn

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Sultan's Walk

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Palace Gate

5421.name: Sultan's Walk
5421.description:
The main road north from the square continues here, surrounded by the
walls of the Palace and the Daemon. To the north you see the heavily
guarded gate and can make out faint sounds of trade to the south.
Buildings crowd together on all sides. The sounds of city life echo
around.

north.description: Inside The Northern Gate Of New Thalos

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Sultan's Walk

5422.name: Inside The Northern Gate Of New Thalos
5422.description:
Two large stone towers rise up to greet you with a massive iron gate
swinging between on ornately crafted hinges and emblazend with the crest
of New Thalos. The makers of this city spared no costs in rebuilding the
defenses of their home. Sultan's Walk runs to the south and the Casbah
stretches out east and west. To the north is wilderness. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past. The sounds of city life echo around.

north.description: Outside The Northern Gate Of New Thalos

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Sultan's Walk

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

5423.name: Inside The West Gate Of New Thalos
5423.description:
Two large stone towers embedded in the wall loom over you. The massive
iron gate, emblazoned with the crest of New Thalos, swings easily on
four ornately crafted hinges. It is obvious the makers of this city
spared no expense in protecting their home. Main street heads towards
the market eastward and the wilderness beckons from the west. To the
south lies the entrance the Warriors' Guild. Buildings crowd together on
all sides. The sounds of city life echo around.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to West Main Street

south.description: A passage leads to The Entrance To The Guild of Warriors

west.description: Outside The West Gate Of New Thalos

5424.name: West Main Street
5424.description:
This is the main road traveling though the city. To the south you hear
the hammering of the repair shop and to the north is the grassy field
known as Temple Square. Main street continues east and west. Buildings
crowd together on all sides. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Temple Square

east.description: The cobblestones lead to West Main Street

south.description: A passage leads to The Repair Shop

west.description: Inside The West Gate Of New Thalos

5425.name: West Main Street
5425.description:
A foreman stands stand here watching over two construction workers
fixing a pothole. The road here branches off north and south into two
alleys behind the stores of the market. The main street continues east
and west from here. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.
The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

east.description: The cobblestones lead to West Main Street

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

west.description: The cobblestones lead to West Main Street

5426.name: West Main Street
5426.description:
The area is strolling on the street between the bank and general store.
To the west you hear a roadcrew at work and to the east, the sounds of
commerce taking place. The air is filled with the smell of gold and
riches. On the wall of the store is a poster. Buildings crowd together
on all sides. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Western Market Square

west.description: The cobblestones lead to West Main Street

5427.name: East Main Street
5427.description:
Here on East Main, you smell the odor of freshly slaughtered meat and,
hear the pounding of new metal from the armory. The Square is to the
west and a junction is to the East. The smell of smoke and humanity
hangs in the air. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to East Main Street

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Eastern Market Square

5428.name: East Main Street
5428.description:
The area is East Main Street. To the North is the beginning of Guildsman
Row. To the South is a dark alley. The road also continues to the East.
There is a small sign on a wire hanging across the junction. The smell
of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. Buildings crowd together on all
sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Guildsman's Row

east.description: The cobblestones lead to East Main Street

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

west.description: The cobblestones lead to East Main Street

5429.name: East Main Street
5429.description:
As you walk by the mercenary guild a cold chill causes you to shiver
uncontrollably. You see some shady looking characters lurking about the
entrance to this house of 'helpful' people. Perhaps curiosity gets the
best of you, but you wonder what could be going on inside. To the north
you see the open doors of the apothecary shop where one may buy many
magical livations. Main Street continues east and west from here.
Buildings crowd together on all sides. Vendors and pedestrians bustle
past.

north.description: A passage leads to The Witch's Brew

east.description: The cobblestones lead to East Main Street

south.description: A passage leads to The Mercenaries' Guild

west.description: The cobblestones lead to East Main Street

5430.name: East Main Street
5430.description:
The Main street through eastern New Thalos begins here and heads
westward towards the marketplace. One of the main gates can be seen to
the east and Braheem's Magic Shop awaits your business to the north. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past.

north.description: A passage leads to Braheem's Magic Shop

east.description: Inside the Eastern Gate of New Thalos

west.description: The cobblestones lead to East Main Street

5431.name: Inside the Eastern Gate of New Thalos
5431.description:
Two large stone towers imbedded in the wall loom over you. The massive
iron gate, emblazened with the crest of New Thalos, swings easily on
four ornately crafted hinges. It is obvious the makers of this city
spared no expense in protecting their home. Main street heads towards
the market westward and the wilderness beckons from the east. To the
north lies the entrance to the Mages' Guild. The sounds of city life
echo around. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: A passage leads to The Entrance To The Mages' Tower

east.description: Outside The Eastern Gate Of New Thalos

west.description: The cobblestones lead to East Main Street

5432.name: Cassandra's Catch Of The Day
5432.description:
Nothing in your life has prepared you for the odor which fills your
lungs. Not wanting to offend the beautiful shopkeeper you hold your
tongue and quietly look over her selection. Shadows gather in the
corners. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to East Ishtar Drive

5433.name: West Ishtar Drive
5433.description:
This is the warehouse district of New Thalos. Strong men walk back and
forth from the docks to the warehouse carrying large crates loading and
unloading the boats as they sail down the river. To the north is one of
the entrances of the warehouse and West Ishtar leads east. The sounds of
city life echo around. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the
air.

north.description: A passage leads to The Warehouse

east.description: The cobblestones lead to West Ishtar Drive

5434.name: West Ishtar Drive
5434.description:
A few men walk by almost pushing you out of the way as they go about
their business of loading and unloading the boats. An entrance to one of
the huge warehouses of New Thalos is to the north and the River Ishtar
quietly flows by to the south. Ishtar Drive continues east and west. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past.

north.description: A passage leads to The Warehouse

east.description: The cobblestones lead to West Ishtar Drive

west.description: The cobblestones lead to West Ishtar Drive

5435.name: West Ishtar Drive
5435.description:
The cobblestone road is moist here, the trail of water heading down to
the boat ramp. Catching your balance as you start to slide on the slick
pavement you grab on to the handrail someone has conveniently placed
here. To the north is the Shipwright and Ishtar Drive continues east and
west. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. The smell of
smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: A passage leads to The Shipwright

east.description: The cobblestones lead to West Ishtar Drive

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Boat Ramp

west.description: The cobblestones lead to West Ishtar Drive

5436.name: West Ishtar Drive
5436.description:
A cool breeze blows up off the river chilling the sweat otherwise
present on your skin. Orders and sometimes curses can be heard from the
west in the direction of the warehouses. The common square opens up to
the east and Ishtar Drive continues west. The smell of smoke and
humanity hangs in the air. The sounds of city life echo around.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Common Square

west.description: The cobblestones lead to West Ishtar Drive

5437.name: East Ishtar Drive
5437.description:
Loud hammering and the sound of red hot iron cooling in water reaches
your ears as you stand in front of the blacksmith. A small boy runs up
to you with big eyes and, as you return his gaze, runs off down the
road. The common square can be seen to the west and Ishtar Drive
continues to the east. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless
feet. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: A passage leads to The Forge

east.description: The cobblestones lead to East Ishtar Drive

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Common Square

5438.name: East Ishtar Drive
5438.description:
The wide road bordering the south of town continues to the east west
here, bordered only by the hay-loft to the north and the River Ishtar to
the south. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The sounds of city life
echo around.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to East Ishtar Drive

west.description: The cobblestones lead to East Ishtar Drive

5439.name: East Ishtar Drive
5439.description:
Small clumps of hay strewn about the ground alerts you to the fact that
you have reached the stables. Arabian stallions as well as many other
fine breeds of horses can be purchased for a price. Ishtar Drive
continues east and west. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the
air. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Royal Stables

east.description: The cobblestones lead to East Ishtar Drive

west.description: The cobblestones lead to East Ishtar Drive

5440.name: East Ishtar Drive
5440.description:
Even in broad daylight, you can hardly see into the back alley that
begins here and heads north. Sounds of loud drunken folk and the
occasional screaming cat emenate from the direction. Luckily you have
the choice of going east or west down the drive as well. The sounds of
city life echo around. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the
air.

north.description: You see murky darkness.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to East Ishtar Drive

west.description: The cobblestones lead to East Ishtar Drive

5441.name: East Ishtar Drive
5441.description:
Your highly acute sense of smell reports you have reached the entrance
to the fish market. Although renowned for it fresh catches and wide
selection of aquarian delicacies you wonder how much longer you can
endure the smell! The River Ishtar flows alongside to the south with the
drive running along side it east to west. Vendors and pedestrians bustle
past. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: A passage leads to Cassandra's Catch Of The Day

east.description: The cobblestones lead to East Ishtar Drive

west.description: The cobblestones lead to East Ishtar Drive

5442.name: East Ishtar Drive
5442.description:
The sound of squawking gulls and the smell of rotting fish gives you a
hint of your location. The River Ishtar flows to the south, but looks
crystal clear, so it cannot be the source of this putrid smell. Looking
north you notice a small sign hanging over the dump. The cobblestones
are worn smooth by countless feet. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs
in the air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Dump

west.description: The cobblestones lead to East Ishtar Drive

5443.name: The Boat Ramp
5443.description:
This sloped slab of stone allows easy passage to and from the River
Ishtar. Boats are moored to the docks here awaiting their masters to
return from the warehouses and the pubs. The waters of the River Ishtar
lap at your feet to the south and Ishtar Drive is to the north. The
sounds of city life echo around. Buildings crowd together on all
sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to West Ishtar Drive

south.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5444.name: West Casbah
5444.description:
The air takes on a somber note as you stand before the entrance to the
jailhouse of New Thalos. Hopefully you won't ever see this structure
from the inside. The northwest tower stands here with a spiral staircase
leading up. The Avenue ends here, only exiting to the east. The smell of
smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The sounds of city life echo around
you.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to West Casbah

south.description: A passage leads to The Jail

up.description: A passage leads to The Northwest Tower

5445.name: West Casbah
5445.description:
You have almost reached the end of the Avenue in this direction, the
number of guards in this part of town is nearly doubled. To the north
the familiar city wall protects you from the wilderness. Looking south
marble stairs rise towards the entrance of city hall surrounded by
massive white pillars. The Avenue continues east and west from here.
Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. Buildings crowd together on all
sides.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

south.description: A passage leads to City Hall

west.description: The cobblestones lead to West Casbah

5446.name: The Casbah
5446.description:
The wall of the Palace curves south from here, a darkened alley runs
along it in that direction. West of here you see the steps of the City
Hall and notice the increase in the number of guards. To the east the
Avenue continues. The sounds of city life echo around. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

west.description: The cobblestones lead to West Casbah

5447.name: The Casbah
5447.description:
As you travel down the road towards towards the City Hall you look up at
the guards walking along the wall keeping watch. to the South stands the
great walls of the Palace and the Avenue goes east and west. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. Buildings crowd together
on all sides.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

5448.name: The Casbah
5448.description:
The cobblestone pavement runs along the north wall here. to the South
stand the great walls of the Palace and the Avenue goes east and west.
Buildings crowd together on all sides. The cobblestones are worn smooth
by countless feet.

east.description: Inside The Northern Gate Of New Thalos

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

5449.name: The Casbah
5449.description:
The activity here is only slightly less than chaotic. Young boys run to
and fro with stern intent, and older gentleman swagger down the street
towards the Library. To the west Visible is the tall towers of the
northern gate, and the Avenue continues east. The cobblestones are worn
smooth by countless feet. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the
air.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

west.description: Inside The Northern Gate Of New Thalos

5450.name: The Casbah
5450.description:
Walking along the cobblestone path you feel secure with the walls of the
city towering over you. You hear the scraping sounds of metal on stone
and look up to see a large, strong guard looking out to the north. To
the east lies the intersection on Guildsman's Row and the northern gate
is a short walk to the west. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet. The sounds of city life echo around.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

5451.name: The Casbah
5451.description:
The din of the guilds assaults your senses as you reach this
intersection, the sound of hammering, the smell of tanned leather, and
the smoke rising from the smithy all rush up to greet you. The Avenue
continues east and west from here and the Row leads south. Buildings
crowd together on all sides. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Guildsman's Row

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

5452.name: The Casbah
5452.description:
You walk between the solid stone wall of the city and that of the
Masons' Guild. Young children with their nannies walk around enjoying
the saftey of the city. The Avenue runs east and west from here. The
smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The cobblestones are worn
smooth by countless feet.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

5453.name: The Casbah
5453.description:
You have almost reached the end of the Avenue in this direction. Walking
towards the north-east corner of the city you notice the population
density here is much less then the rest of the town. A few old men
hobbling on canes and young men intent on studies are the only travelers
of the path to the library on a regular basis. The Avenue continues east
and west from here. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. Buildings crowd
together on all sides.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

5454.name: The Casbah
5454.description:
The Avenue ends here, turning south to become Kali Row. Traveling in
that direction will take you to the Library and the grand dance hall of
the city. The northeast tower of the wall is accessible here up a spiral
staircase. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Kali Row

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

up.description: A passage leads to The Northeast Tower

5455.name: Kali Row
5455.description:
This is a small, newly added section of the town. The city's Library can
be entered through the door to the west and the Casbah begins its
journey a little ways north of here. The Row and the entrance to the
dancehall is to the south. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Kali Row

west.description: A passage leads to The Library

5456.name: Kali Row
5456.description:
The short Row ends abruptly here at the entrance to the dance hall of
New Thalos. The entrance to the hall is to the west and the Row
continues northward. Buildings crowd together on all sides. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Kali Row

west.description: A passage leads to The Dance Hall

5457.name: Underground
5457.description:
Beneath the streets of Thalos, this underground chamber serves some
forgotten purpose. Water stains mark the stone walls, and debris litters
the floor. Distant sounds of the city above echo faintly through cracks
in the ceiling. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The sounds of city
life echo around.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

5458.name: Alley
5458.description:
This is a dark alley running between the Palace and City Hall. Not a lot
here, unless you're partial to spiders and rats. Buildings crowd
together on all sides. The sounds of city life echo around.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

5459.name: Alley
5459.description:
This narrow alley cuts between two towering buildings, barely wide
enough for a cart to pass. Shadows gather in the cramped space, and the
smell of refuse and cooking fires mingles unpleasantly. Vendors and
pedestrians bustle past. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

down.description: You see a manhole covering an opening in the road.

5460.name: Guildsman's Row
5460.description:
This Row is a hive of activity second only to the actual Market Square
itself. Along this row stands all the guilds of the working class
citizens of New Thalos, here all the items sold in the Square are made.
Along this particular stretch of the row lie the Boyer/ Fletcher to the
west and the Masons' to the east. The Row leads off to the south and
East Casbah is to the north. Buildings crowd together on all sides. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

east.description: A passage leads to The Masons' Guild

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Guildsman's Row

west.description: A passage leads to The Boyer/Fletchers' Guild

5461.name: Guildsman's Row
5461.description:
The guilds continue here, to the west is the Weavers' Guild, and to the
east stands the Craftsmans' Guild. The row of guilds continues north and
south from here. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The smell of smoke
and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Guildsman's Row

east.description: A passage leads to The Craftsmans' Guild

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Guildsman's Row

west.description: A passage leads to The Weavers' Guild

5462.name: Guildsman's Row
5462.description:
Only one guild offers its door to this stretch of the Row, the Tanners'
Guild, to the west. To the east is a beautifully sculpted marble door
allowing entrance to the Museum of the Greater Gods. The Row of Guilds
leads north and south. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. Buildings
crowd together on all sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Guildsman's Row

east.description: A passage leads to The Museum Of The Greater Gods

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Guildsman's Row

west.description: A passage leads to The Tanners' Guild

5463.name: Guildsman's Row
5463.description:
After the guilds were built the people of the city used some of the
extra space to erect a shrine to their patron saints. The result of this
labor became the Museum of the Greater Gods. You may enter the sacred
hall to the east. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Guildsman's Row

east.description: A passage leads to The Museum Of The Greater Gods

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Guildsman's Row

5464.name: Guildsman's Row
5464.description:
This small cramped road is worn with travel as apprentices to the guilds
run merchandise from the guildhouses to the shops on Market Square. The
guildhouses lie to the north and Main street is to the south. Buildings
crowd together on all sides. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in
the air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Guildsman's Row

south.description: The cobblestones lead to East Main Street

5465.name: Alley
5465.description:
Even with your light you cannot seem to penetrate the magical cloak of
darkness covering this alley. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in
the air. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to East Main Street

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

5466.name: Alley
5466.description:
Even with your light you cannot seem to penetrate the magical cloak of
darkness covering this alley. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

west.description: A passage leads to Ye Old Leather Shoppe

5467.name: Alley
5467.description:
Even with your light you cannot seem to penetrate the magical cloak of
darkness covering this alley. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.
Buildings crowd together on all sides.

east.description: A passage leads to Smuggler's Inn

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

5468.name: Alley
5468.description:
Even with your light you cannot seem to penetrate the magical cloak of
darkness covering this alley. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

south.description: The cobblestones lead to East Ishtar Drive

5469.name: Alley
5469.description:
This is a tiny corner in the alley. The temple walls are north and west.
You notice a fair amount of footprints to the east. The cobblestones are
worn smooth by countless feet. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

5470.name: Alley
5470.description:
This is a dead end to the tiny alley. There is an unusual amount of wear
apparent on the ground. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless
feet. The sounds of city life echo around.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

down.description: You see a small iron circle imbedded in the ground.

5471.name: Alley
5471.description:
This is a tiny ally between the temple and the bank. You hear some
shouting and general roadwork to the south. The ground is rough and in
need of repair. In the road is a small pothole. The smell of smoke and
humanity hangs in the air. The cobblestones are worn smooth by countless
feet.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

south.description: The cobblestones lead to West Main Street

5472.name: Alley
5472.description:
The area is a small alley between the repair shop and the general store.
Nothing much here but small rodents and dust. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to West Main Street

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

5473.name: Alley
5473.description:
This is a small corner in the alley behind the warehouses and the guild
of warriors. You notice some small scrapings to the west. The smell of
smoke and humanity hangs in the air. Vendors and pedestrians bustle
past.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

5474.name: Alley
5474.description:
The alley ends here as do the footprints you had noticed earlier. The
smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The cobblestones are worn
smooth by countless feet.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

down.description: You see a small round iron plate set in the ground.

5475.name: Underground
5475.description:
This is a small underground passage beneath the city. You see a small
glint of light from above and the passage continues south. The sounds of
city life echo around. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

5476.name: Underground
5476.description:
The underground passage is dark and damp, with moisture seeping through
ancient mortar. Stone pillars support the ceiling, and you can hear the
muffled sounds of the marketplace directly above. The sounds of city
life echo around. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

5477.name: Underground
5477.description:
The tunnel branches here going north, east, and west. The sounds of city
life echo around. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The bustle of
urban life surrounds this area. Voices and footsteps echo from nearby
streets.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

5478.name: Underground
5478.description:
The alley turns again here and heads south and west. You notice a small
glint of light from above. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The
smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

5479.name: Underground
5479.description:
The passage ends here and you hear some low chanting from the west. You
also notice the clearing of dust on the ground but can't seem to find
any door in that direction. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the
air. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

5480.name: Underground
5480.description:
The small passage continues north and south from here. The cobblestones
are worn smooth by countless feet. Buildings crowd together on all
sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

5481.name: Underground
5481.description:
The small passage heads north and east from here. You here the sounds of
the city above. The sounds of city life echo around. Buildings
crowd together on all sides.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

5482.name: Underground
5482.description:
The tunnel continues you west and east. Hopefully you have a good sense
of direction. Buildings crowd together on all sides. The cobblestones
are worn smooth by countless feet.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

5483.name: River Ishtar
5483.description:
High above on the top of the city wall guards look down to see if
you wish to exit the city via water. To do so they must open the iron
grating ahead from above. The horrid smell of the dump wafts
down from the shore. The water churns with dangerous currents. Waves
crash and foam relentlessly.

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5484.name: River Ishtar
5484.description:
The gentle flow of the river carries you eastward, looking up you see
couples strolling along the road. To the west you see the southern
bridge and to the east you see the iron grating protecting the city from
unwanted guests. Spray mists the air around. The roar of water fills
your ears.

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5485.name: River Ishtar
5485.description:
You hear your voice echo as you float under the bridge above. The city
construction crews have just recently finished the small ladder giving
common-folk easy access to the river. To the west and east you see the
river flowing by the city. Waves crash and foam relentlessly. The water
churns with dangerous currents.

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

up.description: The cobblestones lead to The Southern Bridge

5486.name: River Ishtar
5486.description:
This part of the river seems alive with activity. Boats moored to the
docks near the ramp north of here make navigation a bit more trying. As
the river flows eastward Visible is the southern bridge in that
direction. The water churns with dangerous currents. The depths are dark
and unknowable.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Boat Ramp

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5487.name: River Ishtar
5487.description:
The river flows through a huge iron grating from the wilderness through
the city. Strong guards above await word to open the portal should any
citizen require exit or entry. The water churns with dangerous currents.
The depths are dark and unknowable.

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5488.name: A Dark Passage
5488.description:
You seem to have stumbled into a small hand made passage. The wall to
the west doesn't look quite right but searching it reveals no secret
doors. The only exit it seems is east. The cobblestones are worn smooth
by countless feet. The sounds of city life echo around.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to A Dark Passage

5489.name: A Dark Passage
5489.description:
The small passage continues east and west from here. Again you notice
something peculiar about the wall, this time to the north, but you fail
to find any secret doors. Voices can be faintly heard from the north.
Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. Buildings crowd together on all
sides.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to A Dark Passage

west.description: The cobblestones lead to A Dark Passage

5490.name: A Dark Passage
5490.description:
The small passage continues west and east from here. The sounds of city
life echo around. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. The
bustle of urban life surrounds this area. Voices and footsteps echo from
nearby streets.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to A Dark Passage

west.description: The cobblestones lead to A Dark Passage

5491.name: A Dark Passage
5491.description:
The small passage ends here for no apparent reason. Looking around
find a small ladder half buried in the dirt. setting it up you find a
trap door in the ceiling. The passage continues west from here. The
smell of smoke and humanity hangs in the air. Vendors and pedestrians
bustle past.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to A Dark Passage

up.description: An open path leads to Outside The Wall

5492.name: Underground
5492.description:
Beneath Thalos, this subterranean room shows signs of old construction -
perhaps part of the original city before it was built over. Crumbling
brick walls and a low ceiling create a claustrophobic atmosphere. The
cobblestones are worn smooth by countless feet. The smell of smoke and
humanity hangs in the air.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

5493.name: Underground
5493.description:
The underground chamber extends into darkness, its original purpose long
forgotten. Stone blocks form the walls, and rubble is piled in corners.
Somewhere ahead, you hear the echo of dripping water. The smell of smoke
and humanity hangs in the air. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet.

east.description: A passage leads to Underground

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

5500.name: Underground
5500.description:
This hidden space beneath the city streets was clearly once more grand.
Now water seeps through cracks, and the stone floor is uneven from
settling. Rats scurry in the shadows between fallen stonework. Shadows
gather in the corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: A passage leads to Underground

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Underground

5501.name: Underground
5501.description:
Deep underground, this chamber smells of damp earth and decay. The walls
are rough-cut stone, and wooden beams shore up sections of ceiling that
look ready to collapse. Dust motes drift in the stale air. Shadows
gather in the corners.

east.description: A passage leads to Underground

west.description: A passage leads to Underground

5502.name: Underground
5502.description:
The underground room is cramped and dark, with barely enough headroom to
stand. Water has pooled in low spots on the uneven floor, and the air is
thick with moisture and the smell of mold. Dust motes drift in the stale
air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to A Dark Passage

west.description: A passage leads to Underground

5503.name: Clerics' Sanctum
5503.description:
You walk down the staircase into the silent inner sanctum. Here sits
your guildmaster ready to assist you when the time is right. The room is
completely silent. The only obvious exit is back up the staircase into
the the Nectar. The air is still and musty. The ceiling hangs low
overhead.

east.description: You notice the floor at the base of the eastern wall has some faint scratches in it.

up.description: A passage leads to Nectar Of The Gods

5504.name: The Chamber Of The High Priest
5504.description:
The entrance opens to the chamber of the most holy man in New Thalos.
The High Priest advises the Sultan on all matters in the world of the
sacred. From what you have heard however, this holy man has a bit of a
temper, and he doesn't look very happy that you've disturbed his
prayers. The only obvious exit is south. The air is still and musty.
Dust motes drift in the stale air.

south.description: A passage leads to Inside The Temple

5505.name: By The Altar
5505.description:
The area is by the temple altar in the northern end of Temple of New
Thalos. A huge altar made of highly polished black onyx is standing
ahead. Behind this altar sits a twelve foot tall statue of Akbal, the
highest god in all the lands. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

south.description: A passage leads to Inside The Temple

5506.name: The Weavers' Guild
5506.description:
Rows and rows of uncut cloth lie about waiting to be hemed up into
tailored clothes. Cotten is brought in from the country side and spun up
into cloth and dyed different colors. A young boy walks in, grabs a pile
of clothing and leaves. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.
Dust motes drift in the stale air.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Guildsman's Row

5507.name: The Craftsmans' Guild
5507.description:
The entrance opens to a busy workshop filled with people running amok
with various tools and materials. The air is tense with the rush to
complete various projects and creations. Dust motes drift in the stale
air. Shadows gather in the corners.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Guildsman's Row

5508.name: Inside The Temple
5508.description:
The temple continues here, but not on such a grand scale. The place
still looks immaculate. To the north you see the chamber of the High
Priest and a sign on the door in BIG letters thats reads 'DO NOT
DISTURB' To the south is the entrance to the Clerics' Guild. The ceiling
hangs low overhead. The air is still and musty.

north.description: A passage leads to The Chamber Of The High Priest

east.description: A passage leads to Inside The Temple

south.description: A passage leads to The Entrance To The Guild of Clerics

5509.name: Inside The Temple
5509.description:
Huge marble pillars rise on either side of you and grab hold of the
ceiling. Between each of these, fine softstone frescoes have been carved
depicting scenes from the religous history of New Thalos. Rows of pews
face forward giving their full attention to the pulpit rising high above
the ground. The deep red carpeting underfoot shows not a speck of wear
or dirt. It is obvious that New Thalonians take religion seriously.
Shadows gather in the corners. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch.

north.description: A passage leads to By The Altar

east.description: A passage leads to The Donation Room

south.description: The cobblestones lead to The Temple Gates

west.description: A passage leads to Inside The Temple

5510.name: The Donation Room
5510.description:
This room is new to the temple, it was created during the hard times
that had struck the city in recent decades. Luckily for them the Sultan
had been hoarding some of the basic neccesities for just such an
occasion. These days the donation room depends on the generosity of
wealthy adventurers, and a curse on any that walk in to take everything.
Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

west.description: A passage leads to Inside The Temple

5511.name: The Museum Of The Greater Gods
5511.description:
Four large stone statues reside in the museum. They were constructed by
the people of New Thalos to pay homage to the saints they believe to
have saved all their lives. The museum continues to the south. Dust
motes drift in the stale air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch.

south.description: A passage leads to The Museum Of The Greater Gods

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Guildsman's Row

5512.name: The Entrance To The Guild of Clerics
5512.description:
This hall pales in comparison to that of the main hall, but is beautiful
in its own right. Shaven heads and brown robes can be seen milling about
quitely talking to each other. North is back inside the temple proper,
and south is the entrance to the clerics' bar. Dust motes drift in the
stale air. The air is still and musty.

north.description: A passage leads to Inside The Temple

south.description: A passage leads to Nectar Of The Gods

5513.name: The Temple Gates
5513.description:
The area opens before the entrance way to the Temple of New Thalos. Two
large wrought iron gates lie open before. Although they might not ever
be used the priests in the temple are ready to defend themselves, should
their city ever come under seige again. The smell of smoke and humanity
hangs in the air. The sounds of city life echo around.

north.description: A passage leads to Inside The Temple

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Temple Square

down.description: The cobblestones lead to Temple Square

5514.name: Ahkeem's Stuff
5514.description:
You step into a shop swirling with smoke. Ahkeem seems to have a liking
for things not of this world... very strange stuff indeed. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Northwestern Market Square

5515.name: Vera's Veggies
5515.description:
This is a busy place. Customers shuffle around, bartering for lower
prices on the wide selection of vegetables. You can still hear your
mother telling you 'Eat your Veggies'. That is probably why you are
spending time in the city of New Thalos and not with her. But wait...
Vera looks just like your mother! Shadows gather in the corners. The air
is still and musty.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to Northeastern Market Square

5516.name: The Museum Of The Greater Gods
5516.description:
Four large stone statues reside in the museum. They were constructed by
the people of New Thalos to pay homage to the saints they believe to
have saved all their lives. The museum continues to the north. The air
is still and musty. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

north.description: A passage leads to The Museum Of The Greater Gods

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Guildsman's Row

5517.name: The Base Of The Tower
5517.description:
You walk into a cold room whose only feature is an old wooden staircase
spirling up along the wall to a higher level. Up these stairs you are
told awaits the old mage who may be able to help you advance in your
studies. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Mages' Courtyard

south.description: You see some small scratches on the floor near the base of the wall.

up.description: A passage leads to The Mage's Laboratory

5518.name: The Mages' Courtyard
5518.description:
You enter a small tiled courtyard with a small fountain in the middle.
Around the sides are four wrought iron benches with cushions where the
mages of the land sit and exchange ideas. To the west stands a two-story
tower where the leader of the mages' guild performs his experiments.
Buildings crowd together on all sides. The smell of smoke and humanity
hangs in the air.

south.description: A passage leads to The Entrance To The Mages' Tower

west.description: A passage leads to The Base Of The Tower

5519.name: Nectar Of The Gods
5519.description:
The area is startled by the lavishness of this place. From what you know
of clerics they are supposed to be humble people, giving all their
material goods to their cause. Perhaps because only clerics are allowed
to enter this bar they have condoned making it as comfortable as
possible. In the corner stands a staircase leading down to the meditaion
chambers. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Dust motes drift in the stale
air.

north.description: A passage leads to The Entrance To The Guild of Clerics

down.description: A passage leads to Clerics' Sanctum

5520.name: Temple Square
5520.description:
This area is the meeting grounds of those with holy intentions. Monks,
bards, paladins and clerics mill around either preaching or listening to
their fellows preach. Huge marble steps lead up to the gates of the
temple and Main Street lies to the south. The smell of smoke and
humanity hangs in the air. The sounds of city life echo around you.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Temple Gates

south.description: The cobblestones lead to West Main Street

up.description: The cobblestones lead to The Temple Gates

5521.name: The Bank
5521.description:
The area opens in a large building decorated with black marble and red
satin. Huge pillars support an arched ceiling far above your head. You
wonder at the skill the dwarves have for detail as you examine the trim.
Fine silver seperates the polished blocks that make up the floor. The
ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Northwestern Market Square

5522.name: The Butchery
5522.description:
This shop has the aroma of freshly slaughterd beasts. You feel right at
home. You see a fairly simple set up. The corpses... er... selections
hang on hooks, still bleeding into catch pans that drain into a single
underground vat. You wonder where that leads... Shadows gather in the
corners. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Northeastern Market Square

5523.name: The Witch's Brew
5523.description:
The first thing you notice as you walk into this spacious shop is the
hundreds of candles that line the shelves. The swirling mist that
surrounds your feet makes it seem that you have stepped into a gateway
to another plane. A cluttered table stands near the far wall, opposite
the doorway. Shadows gather in the corners. The walls are rough-hewn and
cold to the touch.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to East Main Street

5524.name: Braheem's Magic Shop
5524.description:
You enter a shop crowded with bookshelves and clutterd with scrolls. The
owner seems to be hard at work on his latest magical creation. You see a
small sign on the wall. Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes drift
in the stale air.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to East Main Street

5525.name: The Entrance To The Mages' Tower
5525.description:
The entrance hall is a small poor lighted room. It would seem its only
purpose is to house the powerful sorcerer standing here guarding the
entrance. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Dust motes
drift in the stale air.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to The Mages' Courtyard

south.description: Inside the Eastern Gate of New Thalos

5526.name: The Entrance To The Guild of Warriors
5526.description:
This small hall is merely a check point to keep the unwanted out. The
air is still and musty. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.
The air is stale and the walls close. Shadows pool in the corners,
undisturbed.

north.description: Inside The West Gate Of New Thalos

south.description: A passage leads to The Whet Stone

5527.name: The Repair Shop
5527.description:
One of the most popular shops in New Thalos, this shop is always a hive
of activity. It is almost inhuman the way one man can fix all types of
armour singlehandedly. If you have an item in need of repair simply give
it to the man behind the counter. There is a small sign on the counter.
The ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to West Main Street

5528.name: The General Store
5528.description:
The new found wealth of this beautiful city is apearant in the exotic
items for sale here. You wonder what would happen if you typed...
LIST... The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Southwestern Market Square

5529.name: Abdul's Armour
5529.description:
The sound of hammering metal grows louder as you enter the armoury.
Young boys run to and fro carrying buckets of water and coal. A few
dwarves work on sections of armour in the back of the shop, their
hammers working too fast to follow. The walls are adorned in all of
Abdul's prize creations. Here you can purchase suits of armour meant to
keep monsters from hacking you into little pieces. A note on the wall
beckons your attention. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Southeastern Market Square

5530.name: The Mercenaries' Guild
5530.description:
This guild is frowned upon by most of the population of New Thalos, but
the laws of supply and demand are irresistable. People come here when
they feel unable or are unwilling to fight their own battles. For a
small fee you may hire a henchman. Dust motes drift in the stale air.
The ceiling hangs low overhead.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to East Main Street

east.description: You notice some small scratches in the floor next to the eastern wall.

south.description: The inner guild hall lies south.

5531.name: The Mercenaries Guild
5531.description:
This is the storage room for the mercenaries to be hired. Shadows gather
in the corners. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The air
is stale and the walls close. Shadows pool in the corners, undisturbed.

north.description: The guild entrance is north.

5532.name: Entrance To The Thieves' Guild
5532.description:
This small, dark room has a single torch mounted in the wall for light.
There is a small wooden bench and a book lying on it. The assassin
guarding the entrance from 'outsiders' stands as you walk in. The air is
still and musty. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

south.description: A passage leads to The Filthy Unicorn

west.description: A passage leads to The Mercenaries' Guild

5533.name: The Whet Stone
5533.description:
Very large men with very large swords drink beer from very large mugs.
Everything in this room is BIG. The large round tables are scuffed and
nicked from the numerous bar brawls that have sprung up. It might be a
good idea to hold your tounge for a while as you soak up the atmosphere.
There is an exit to the east where the master swordsman awaits pupils to
train with. The air is still and musty. Dust motes drift in the stale
air.

north.description: A passage leads to The Entrance To The Guild of Warriors

east.description: A passage leads to The Tournament And Practice Yard

5534.name: The Tournament And Practice Yard
5534.description:
This is a wide expanse of grass filled with dummies, punching bags and
swordpupils. To the north you see a man dressed in black robes, unlike
his iron clad comrades, who you assume to be your master. Dust motes
drift in the stale air. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: You see the grass near the base of the wall here is slightly torn.

west.description: A passage leads to The Whet Stone

5535.name: The Bread Stand
5535.description:
A small stand has been set up here, showing the shopkeep's humble
selection. You notice he has added a few things to his list. The ceiling
hangs low overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Southwestern Market Square

5536.name: Igor's Implements Of Destruction
5536.description:
You can't help but shiver as you look at the selection of vicious
weapons. Huge swords and wicked looking axes hang on pegs around the
room. A dwarf sits at a bench in the back hammering away on his latest
creation. It is here you can buy rare and exotic items not found in
other parts of the world. A note catches your eye. The ceiling hangs low
overhead. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to Southeastern Market Square

5537.name: Ye Old Leather Shoppe
5537.description:
This area is a thick oriental rug surrounded on all sides by racks of
numerous leather goods. A few women sit on leather cushions sewing in
some detail work on custom ordered jackets. Shadows gather in the
corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

5538.name: Smuggler's Inn
5538.description:
This isside a filthy inn, that seemingly has been cleaned in decades.
Poker tables line the walls and everyone stares at you as you walk in,
you don't feel very welcome. The bar has numerous knife holes in it and
the bartender leans over waiting for your order. Dust motes drift in the
stale air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Alley

5539.name: The Filthy Unicorn
5539.description:
A draft chills your bones as you enter, though you see no open window or
door. Hooded figures lurk around in the shadows and speak in low voices.
A flash of steel lets you know that weapons are in great abundance in
this crowd. As you quickly check your beltpouch you notice a small
staircase leading down. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The air is still
and musty.

north.description: A passage leads to Entrance To The Thieves' Guild

down.description: A passage leads to The Secret Yard

5540.name: The Warehouse
5540.description:
This is a large room used to store merchandise made in the city before
it is shipped off. All the items here are made in New Thalos and shipped
to other parts of the land. Shadows gather in the corners. The ceiling
hangs low overhead.

east.description: A passage leads to The Warehouse

south.description: The cobblestones lead to West Ishtar Drive

5541.name: The Warehouse
5541.description:
Men walk to and fro counting crates and writing down their findings.
This area of the warehouse is used for storing the raw materials brought
in from areas outside the city. These goods are then delivered to the
various guilds. The export area of the warehouses is to the south. The
air is still and musty. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to West Ishtar Drive

west.description: A passage leads to The Warehouse

5542.name: The Shipwright
5542.description:
The wood under you feet creaks from years of being soaked in saltwater.
An old man with a curly, grey beard stand behind a small counter waiting
to take your order. Behind him are mounted various model sailboats and
large fish. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The air is still and
musty.

east.description: A passage leads to The Drafting Room

south.description: The cobblestones lead to West Ishtar Drive

5543.name: The Drafting Room
5543.description:
The walls are covered with paper sketchings of hull designs. This room
is used by the shipwright to build his creations on paper before making
a single cut in wood. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.
Shadows gather in the corners.

west.description: A passage leads to The Shipwright

5544.name: The Forge
5544.description:
Very much like the weaponsmith this man deals in the molding of metal.
It seems that most of his creations deal with horses. On the walls you
see several horseshoes made of iron. The room is hot, hotter than the
desert just south of here, and one wonders how the smithy can stand it.
The air is still and musty. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to East Ishtar Drive

5545.name: The Royal Stables
5545.description:
Nothing you wouldn't expect is here. Several stalls hold the Sultan's
choice Arabian Stallions, and each has their own trough for drinking. A
small boy wanders in sometimes with a shovel to remove the offensive by-
product of such beasts. Vendors and pedestrians bustle past. The sounds
of city life echo around.

east.description: A passage leads to The Hay Loft

south.description: The cobblestones lead to East Ishtar Drive

5546.name: The Secret Yard
5546.description:
This is a hidden yard known to only a few people in New Thalos. Here you
may train in the arts of stealing, picking locks, and becoming almost
invisible. A small staircase leads back up to the Unicorn. Dust motes
drift in the stale air. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

south.description: You see some small scratches in the wall to the south.

up.description: A passage leads to The Filthy Unicorn

5547.name: The Dump
5547.description:
This is the place where the people of the city dump their trash. Due to
the constant winds blowing down the moutains the smell is usually blown
outside the walls and over the desert. The smell of smoke and humanity
hangs in the air. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

south.description: The cobblestones lead to East Ishtar Drive

5548.name: The Mage's Laboratory
5548.description:
The area opens in the top of an old stone tower. Along the walls
hundreds of potions, scroll, and wands lie in disaray. The man you see
before sits hunched over a small wooden table with two beakers of
bubbling liquid in front of him. He looks up as you enter and smiles
broadly. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The air is still and musty.

down.description: A passage leads to The Base Of The Tower

5549.name: The Hay Loft
5549.description:
Not as big as the ones you see on farms in the country, this hay loft
serves as a storage area for the horses in the stables. The young boy
you saw with the shovel seems to have takes up residence on the second
story. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The air is still
and musty.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to The Royal Stables

5550.name: The Grand Entrance
5550.description:
Nowhere have you seen such an obscene display of wealth then in this
corridor. The shaggy carpeting under your feet makes it seem as if you
are walking on a cloud. Platinum candelabras hang delicately from the
ceiling casting light on the ancient tapestries adorning the walls. The
crick in your neck tells you that it is time to stop staring. To the
west the numerous halls of the palace being and the gate lies to the
east. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The walls are rough-hewn and
cold to the touch.

north.description: A passage leads to The Guard House

east.description: The cobblestones lead to The Palace Gate

south.description: A passage leads to The Guard House

west.description: A passage leads to A Hall

5551.name: The Library
5551.description:
This building holds the vast collection of books and documents that have
been brought here by the commitee apointed to recover the lost knowledge
of Thalos. Rows of shelves filled with book in every condition line the
walls. The air has the aroma of old parchment and glue. The walls are
rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Kali Row

5552.name: The Dance Hall
5552.description:
You seem to have missed a huge party. The janitors are here cleaning up
the confetti and pieces of food. Hundreds of empty beer mugs on the
tables surrounding the dance floor suggest that the citizens love their
drink. There is still a banner on the wall. Dust motes drift in the
stale air. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Kali Row

5553.name: The Jail
5553.description:
This is jail. For some reason, someone feels that you've screwed up
pretty bad and should be put away safely for a while. The air is still
and musty. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to West Casbah

5554.name: City Hall
5554.description:
The area opens inside the administrative head of the city. Here the
decisions regarding city policy are made. Although the Sultan's word is
law, he usually spends his time on affairs outside the city wall.
Shadows gather in the corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to West Casbah

5555.name: The Boyer/Fletchers' Guild
5555.description:
The walls in this room are covered with pegs that hold various types of
bows. There are few people working here, lending to the fact that the
skills are rare to come by in the general populas. A few boys are busy
in the corner preparing feathers for the fine shafts used in making
arrows. Some Elven craftsmen are carefuly inspecting each bow as it is
finnished. Dust motes drift in the stale air. Shadows gather in the
corners.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Guildsman's Row

5556.name: The Masons' Guild
5556.description:
There is no doubt that the Dwarves here know what they're doing. They
have been invaluable in the building of this beautiful city. Here they
are hard at work doing what they do best. The hammers fly in a blur as
these talented craftsmen work the stone into ornate bricks, pillars,
trim, and many other forms. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

west.description: The cobblestones lead to Guildsman's Row

5557.name: The Guard House
5557.description:
The area opens inside the southern of the two main guard houses. The
stone interior has a spartan look to it, only the bare neccesities. A
few weapons are mounted on the walls in case they might be needed. The
walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The ceiling hangs low
overhead.

north.description: A passage leads to The Grand Entrance

5558.name: The Palace Gate
5558.description:
The area opens before a magnificantly crafted gate wrought in solid
gold. You gape in awe at the splendor of the spirilng towers beyond the
portal. The ruler of all the eastern lands resides in this fine palace,
and he is not a poor man. The grand entrance lies byond the gate, and
Sultan's Walk is to the east. The smell of smoke and humanity hangs in
the air. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Sultan's Walk

west.description: A passage leads to The Grand Entrance

5559.name: The Northwest Tower
5559.description:
The area opens on one of the four towers guarding the city. The view
from here is great! To the west you see the tall mountains that make up
the divide between here and Midgaard. The River Ishtar slowly flows from
that direction. South Visible is the entire city of New Thalos and the
Great Eastern Desert to the south. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to
the touch. Shadows gather in the corners.

down.description: The cobblestones lead to West Casbah

5560.name: The Guard House
5560.description:
The area opens inside the northern of the two main guard houses. Strong
guards are seated here, playing cards. The stone interior is clean but
bare walled save the weapons and armor mounted in the walls. The only
exit is south. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Dust motes drift in the
stale air.

south.description: A passage leads to The Grand Entrance

5561.name: The Kitchen
5561.description:
Your footsteps echo off the stone tiles of the kitchen. On the south
wall you see the large fire place and a huge copper pot bubbling
merrily. The chef is busy chopping up greens and other vegetables at the
wooden table for tonight's meal. Servants scurry about grabbing utensils
and preparing fresh hares. A small door leads out into the hall
northward and the doorway to the dining hall is west. Shadows gather in
the corners. The air is still and musty.

north.description: A passage leads to A Hall

west.description: A passage leads to The Grand Dining Hall

5562.name: The Northeast Tower
5562.description:
The area opens on one of the four towers guarding the city. To the north
you see the wide plains and then the forset. South of here you see the
city and the Great Eastern Desert beyond. Shadows gather in the corners.
The ceiling hangs low overhead.

down.description: The cobblestones lead to The Casbah

5563.name: A Hall
5563.description:
This is the eastern end of the southern hallway. A small servants'
entrance gives access to the kitchen and the hall continues west. The
walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The ceiling hangs low
overhead.

south.description: A passage leads to The Kitchen

west.description: A passage leads to A Hall

5564.name: The Tanners' Guild
5564.description:
You first notice the pungent smell of freshly tanned leather goods as
you enter this strange place. The next thing that grabs your attention
is the many colors that these people have transformed the beautiful
skins into. The people are streaching the leather and cutting it into
the shapes they need. You notice a small message on a wall. Shadows
gather in the corners. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to Guildsman's Row

5565.name: A Hall
5565.description:
You have come to the eastern end of the northern hallway. The only exit
is west except for the simple wooden door to the north. There is a
golden plaque above the door. The air is still and musty. The ceiling
hangs low overhead.

north.description: A passage leads to The Shrine Of Allah

west.description: A passage leads to A Hall

5566.name: The Shrine Of Allah
5566.description:
As you step into this room you seem to leave the material plane. The
walls here are decorated with beautiful, multi-colored tiles. There is a
strange stillness about the air. You sense the presence of an all-mighty
being. The air is still and musty. Shadows gather in the corners.

south.description: A passage leads to A Hall

5567.name: Outside The Northern Gate Of New Thalos
5567.description:
The area opens outside the gate of New Thalos. The city lies to the
south, and wilderness to the north. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

north.description: An open path leads to On The Plains

south.description: Inside The Northern Gate Of New Thalos

5568.name: Outside The Eastern Gate Of New Thalos
5568.description:
The area opens outside the protective walls of the city. The massive
iron gate sits to the west and the unknown awaits you eastward. Vendors
and pedestrians bustle past. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

east.description: An open path leads to On A Road

south.description: An open path leads to Outside The Wall

west.description: Inside the Eastern Gate of New Thalos

5569.name: Outside The West Gate Of New Thalos
5569.description:
The area opens outside the city walls, the iron gate to the east. The
city lies in that direction and the road to Midgaard lies west. Vendors
