and pedestrians bustle past. Buildings crowd together on all sides.

east.description: Inside The West Gate Of New Thalos

west.description: An open path leads to On A Road

5570.name: Outside The Wall
5570.description:
This is a small clearing outside the east wall of the city. The ground
seems well trodden but Visible is no apparent exit save that to the
north. The open sky stretches overhead. The ground is soft underfoot.

north.description: Outside The Eastern Gate Of New Thalos

5571.name: The Grand Dining Hall
5571.description:
A long oaken table, coverd with silverware, plates, and a table cloth
with gold trim, dominates the room. Although no diners occupy the room
as of yet, servants sprint about setting the table and placing
condiments. The kitchen entrance is to the east, and two huge double
doors open into the hallway north. Shadows gather in the corners. The
air is still and musty.

north.description: A passage leads to A Hall

east.description: A passage leads to The Kitchen

5572.name: A Hall
5572.description:
The area opens at a T-crossing in the long hallways. There are two large
double doors to the south. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the
touch. Shadows gather in the corners.

north.description: A passage leads to A Hall

east.description: A passage leads to A Hall

south.description: A passage leads to The Grand Dining Hall

west.description: A passage leads to A Hall

5573.name: A Hall
5573.description:
The area opens at an intersection of the hallways. Wooden corridors lead
off in all directions except west, the garden of the palace can be
entered there. Shadows gather in the corners. The air is still and
musty.

north.description: A passage leads to A Hall

east.description: A passage leads to A Hall

south.description: A passage leads to A Hall

west.description: An open path leads to The Sultan's Garden

5574.name: A Hall
5574.description:
You have come to a T-crossing on the hallways. The wooden corridors
continue east, west and south. There is a large iron door to the north.
Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

north.description: A passage leads to The Entrance To The Dungeon

east.description: A passage leads to A Hall

south.description: A passage leads to A Hall

west.description: A passage leads to A Hall

5575.name: The Entrance To The Dungeon
5575.description:
You enter a cold damp room with bare roughly hewn stone walls. This room
seems very out of place compared to the splendor of the rest of the
Palace. A large steel grating leads down into darkness, and an iron door
returns you to the hallway. Shadows gather in the corners. The air is
still and musty.

south.description: A passage leads to A Hall

down.description: A passage leads to The Jailer's Room

5576.name: A Guest Room
5576.description:
This is a simple room used for visiting nobles. A small dresser stands
on the east wall with a mirror hung right above it. A queen sized bed
made up in satin sheets stands in the middle of the room against the
south wall under a window. The only obvious exit is north back out into
the hallway. The air is still and musty. Dust motes drift in the stale
air.

north.description: A passage leads to A Hall

5577.name: A Hall
5577.description:
The long hall continues here with a wooden door in the south wall. On
the north wall hangs the picture of some forgotten nobleman who once
ruled the land. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch.

east.description: A passage leads to A Hall

south.description: A passage leads to A Guest Room

west.description: A passage leads to A Hall

5578.name: The Sultan's Garden
5578.description:
The entrance opens to the Sultan's private gardens. A light sweat breaks
out on your skin from the humidity here. All around are thousands of
exotic plants and flowers. The sweet smell of jasmine and honeysuckle
reminds you of happier days at home. Off to the north, through the palm
trees, you see a delicate white gazebo. A path leads out into the
hallway and west towards the gazebo. nearby stands a gold sign. The open
sky stretches overhead. Wildflowers dot the landscape.

east.description: A passage leads to A Hall

west.description: A passage leads to The Garden Gazebo

5579.name: A Hall
5579.description:
The long stretch of hallway continues east and west from here. The small
red carpet covering the centerline is always underfoot and an occasional
bench or potted plant lines the wall. There is a door here to the north
with a plaque mounted over it. The ceiling hangs low overhead. The walls
are rough-hewn and cold to the touch.

north.description: A passage leads to The Art Exhibit

east.description: A passage leads to A Hall

west.description: A passage leads to A Hall

5580.name: The Art Exhibit
5580.description:
This is the Sultan's tribute to the finer virtues. Large paintings hang
from the walls displaying nature scenes, nudes, and glorious victories
in battle. Strange scupltures rest on pedestals at each corner of the
room and mirrors are placed in strategic locations so the viewer may see
an entire sculpture at a glance. Your eyes, however, are pulled towards
a painting that dominates the far wall. The air is still and musty. The
ceiling hangs low overhead.

south.description: A passage leads to A Hall

5581.name: A Guest Room
5581.description:
This is another room made up for visiting nobles. There is a dresser up
against the eastern wall with a mirror above it and a queen sized bed,
made up in satin sheets, against the south wall. The air is still and
musty. Shadows gather in the corners.

north.description: A passage leads to A Hall

5582.name: A Hall
5582.description:
You have reached the western end of the southern hallway. The only exit
is east except for the doors in the southern and western walls. Dust
motes drift in the stale air. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: A passage leads to A Hall

south.description: A passage leads to A Guest Room

west.description: A passage leads to The Harem

5583.name: The Garden Gazebo
5583.description:
Walking through the gardens you come across a small white wooden
structure. The sounds of birds, the smell of flowers, ahhh, paradise.
You believe that you have never been in a more peaceful setting. Dust
motes drift in the stale air. The air is still and musty.

east.description: An open path leads to The Sultan's Garden

5584.name: A Hall
5584.description:
This is the western end of the northern hallway. Two doors are set in
the walls here, one to the north, another to the west. Dust motes drift
in the stale air. Shadows gather in the corners.

north.description: A passage leads to The Guard Room

east.description: A passage leads to A Hall

west.description: A passage leads to The Throne Room

5585.name: The Guard Room
5585.description:
The area opens in a barren chamber lined with nothing but cots and
footlockers. The guards come here when off duty to sleep, for they may
only leave the Palace grounds with special permission. The only exit is
to the south. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The ceiling hangs low
overhead.

south.description: A passage leads to A Hall

5586.name: The Guard Room
5586.description:
This is living quarters for the guards of the palace. Barren compared to
the rest of the Palace, you see only cots and footlockers here. On the
walls you see pictures of well known knights who have give a proud name
to the Sultan's Guard. The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows gather in
the corners.

north.description: A passage leads to The Harem

5587.name: The Harem
5587.description:
This is the room where the Sultan keeps the beautiful women of his
Palace. There are ten girls here lying about the room dressed in silks
you can almost see through. In the western end of the room stands a
large mound of pillows and a beautiful young maiden sits perched atop.
It is unfortunate for you that only the Sultan is allowed in here. The
walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. Shadows gather in the
corners.

north.description: A passage leads to A Small room

east.description: A passage leads to A Hall

south.description: A passage leads to The Guard Room

5588.name: A Small room
5588.description:
This is secret chamber allowing the Sultan direct access to his harem at
any time he chooses. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The ceiling
hangs low overhead.

north.description: A passage leads to The Throne Room

south.description: A passage leads to The Harem

5589.name: The Throne Room
5589.description:
The area opens in the throne room of the mighty Sultan of New Thalos.
Guards stand at attention near his side ready to make the ultimate
sacrifice for their beloved leader. The gold inlaid throne studded with
jewels stands upon a mable dias. The Sultan is not a man to be trifled
with. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The air is still
and musty.

north.description: A passage leads to The Treasure Room

east.description: A passage leads to A Hall

south.description: A passage leads to A Small room

5590.name: The Treasure Room
5590.description:
You have somhow managed to gain access to the treaure vault of the
Sultan. The alarm sounding in the background tells you that you must
have tripped off some kind of alarm system. It might be adviseable to
grab as much stuff as you possibly can and run for the door. Dust motes
drift in the stale air. The air is still and musty.

south.description: A passage leads to The Throne Room

5591.name: The Jailer's Room
5591.description:
Climbing down the old wooden ladder you enter a small cave like room.
There is a small bench with some old magazines and a low burning candle
sitting off to one side. A door is set into the stone on the north wall,
and the steel grating opens up above. Shadows gather in the corners. The
ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel In The Dungeon

up.description: A passage leads to The Entrance To The Dungeon

5592.name: A Tunnel In The Dungeon
5592.description:
The area opens in a roughly hewn stone tunnel with cells to the north
and south. The tunnel continues east. The air is still and musty. The
ceiling hangs low overhead.

north.description: A passage leads to The Cell

east.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel In The Dungeon

south.description: A passage leads to The Cell

west.description: The cobblestones lead to A Dark Passage

5593.name: A Tunnel In The Dungeon
5593.description:
The area opens in a roughly hewn stone tunnel with cells to the north
and south. The tunnel continues east and west. The walls are rough-hewn
and cold to the touch. Shadows gather in the corners.

north.description: A passage leads to The Cell

east.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel In The Dungeon

south.description: A passage leads to The Cell

west.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel In The Dungeon

5594.name: A Tunnel In The Dungeon
5594.description:
The area opens in a roughly hewn stone tunnel with cells to the north
and south. The tunnel continues east and west. The air is still and
musty. Dust motes drift in the stale air.

north.description: A passage leads to The Cell

east.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel In The Dungeon

south.description: A passage leads to The Cell

west.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel In The Dungeon

5595.name: A Tunnel In The Dungeon
5595.description:
The area opens in a roughly hewn stone tunnel with cells to the north
and south. The tunnel continues west and you notice a small crack in the
stone to the east. Shadows gather in the corners. Dust motes drift in
the stale air.

north.description: A passage leads to The Cell

east.description: A passage leads to The Secret Cell

south.description: A passage leads to The Cell

west.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel In The Dungeon

5596.name: The Secret Cell
5596.description:
This room seems more like a lair than a cell. Small bits of hay lie
strewn about the floor covering bones of unkown origin. Spatterd blood
and tufts of grey hair lie matted in one corner. As you turn to leave
you notice a pair of small red eyes peering at you from the darkness.
The air is still and musty. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

west.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel In The Dungeon

5597.name: The Cell
5597.description:
This is a cold, cramped chamber with only one exit. Dust motes drift in
the stale air. The air is still and musty. The air is stale and the
walls close. Shadows pool in the corners, undisturbed.

south.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel In The Dungeon

5598.name: The Cell
5598.description:
This is a cold, cramped chamber with only one exit. The ceiling hangs
low overhead. The air is still and musty. The air is stale and the walls
close. Shadows pool in the corners, undisturbed.

south.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel In The Dungeon

5599.name: The Cell
5599.description:
This is a cold, cramped chamber with only one exit. The air is still and
musty. Shadows gather in the corners. The air is stale and the walls
close. Shadows pool in the corners, undisturbed.

south.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel In The Dungeon

5600.name: The Cell
5600.description:
This is a cold, cramped chamber with only one exit. Shadows gather in
the corners. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The air is
stale and the walls close. Shadows pool in the corners, undisturbed.

south.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel In The Dungeon

5601.name: The Cell
5601.description:
This is a cold, cramped chamber with only one exit. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch. The air is still and musty. The air is stale
and the walls close. Shadows pool in the corners, undisturbed.

north.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel In The Dungeon

5602.name: The Cell
5602.description:
This is a cold, cramped chamber with only one exit. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch. The air is still and musty. The air is stale
and the walls close. Shadows pool in the corners, undisturbed.

north.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel In The Dungeon

5603.name: The Cell
5603.description:
This is a cold, cramped chamber with only one exit. The walls are rough-
hewn and cold to the touch. Dust motes drift in the stale air. The air
is stale and the walls close. Shadows pool in the corners, undisturbed.

north.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel In The Dungeon

5604.name: The Cell
5604.description:
This is a cold, cramped chamber with only one exit. The air is still and
musty. The walls are rough-hewn and cold to the touch. The air is stale
and the walls close. Shadows pool in the corners, undisturbed.

north.description: A passage leads to A Tunnel In The Dungeon

5605.name: A Hall
5605.description:
The area opens in a large cedar wood hall leading east and west. On the
floor lies a thin and narrow purple rug. The hall leads west inside the
Palace and east to the Grand Entrance. The walls are rough-hewn and cold
to the touch. The ceiling hangs low overhead.

east.description: A passage leads to The Grand Entrance

west.description: A passage leads to A Hall

5606.name: A Path Through The Mountains
5606.description:
The narrow path turns here heading south and west. The wind howls around
exposed peaks. The path is steep and treacherous. The rocky terrain is
steep and unforgiving. Thin air makes breathing difficult.

south.description: A steep trail ascends to A Path Through The Mountains

west.description: A steep trail ascends to A Path Through The Mountains

5607.name: A Path Through The Mountains
5607.description:
Travel is hard and slow as you almost have to climb around large
boulders strewn about the path. The wind howls around exposed peaks.
Snow clings to shadowed crevices.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to A Path Through The Mountains

east.description: A steep trail ascends to The Edge Of The Ravine

5608.name: The Edge Of The Ravine
5608.description:
The ground drops off below down to a rushing river. A small rope bridge
sways to and fro in the wind giving you access to the other side. The
wind howls around exposed peaks. The path is steep and treacherous.

east.description: An open path leads to On A Rope Bridge

west.description: A steep trail ascends to A Path Through The Mountains

5609.name: On A Rope Bridge
5609.description:
The small rope bridge shudders under your weight as you make your way
across the valley. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze. Wildflowers dot
the landscape.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to The Edge Of The Ravine

west.description: A steep trail ascends to The Edge Of The Ravine

5610.name: The Ledge Around The Valley
5610.description:
The way continues around a small ledge overlooking a large valley deep
within the eastern mountains. The ledge turns north following the shape
of the valley and a steep trail continues to the east. Bare rock
dominates the landscape. Snow clings to shadowed crevices.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Path Through The Mountains

5611.name: A Path Through The Mountains
5611.description:
The way continues through a rock strewn path deep within the mountains
east of Midgaard. The going is rough and you constantly twist your ankle
on the small stones lying about. The air is thin and cold at this
altitude. The wind howls around exposed peaks.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Path Through The Mountains

west.description: A steep trail ascends to The Ledge Around The Valley

5612.name: On The Eastern Edge Of The Mountains
5612.description:
The area opens on the eastern edge of the eastern mountains. The high
peaks lie to the west and rolling hills and plains open up to the east.
Bare rock dominates the landscape. The air is thin and cold at this
altitude.

south.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Foothills

west.description: A steep trail ascends to A Path Through The Mountains

5613.name: In The Foothills
5613.description:
The path curves down the face of the mountain allowing you to move up or
down the face of this missive hunk of stone. The air is thin and cold at
this altitude. Snow clings to shadowed crevices.

north.description: On The Eastern Edge Of The Mountains

east.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Foothills

5614.name: In The Foothills
5614.description:
The path curves down the face of the mountain allowing you to move up or
down as you please. The air is thin and cold at this altitude. The path
is steep and treacherous.

south.description: A steep trail ascends to A Rocky Trail

west.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Foothills

5615.name: A Rocky Trail
5615.description:
The faint sound of a flowing river reaches your ears from the south and
through the trees Visible is water. The path you are on continues north
and east from here. The air is thin and cold at this altitude. The wind
howls around exposed peaks.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Foothills

east.description: A rocky path climbs toward On A Road

south.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5616.name: On A Road
5616.description:
The road here is well-maintained, paved with fitted stones worn smooth
by countless travelers. Buildings line both sides, and you can hear the
bustle of Thalos's commerce and daily life all around. The ground is
soft underfoot. The open sky stretches overhead.

east.description: An open path leads to On A Road

south.description: An open path leads to On A Road

5617.name: On A Road
5617.description:
The well kept road continues east and west from here. Tall grass sways
in a gentle breeze. The open sky stretches overhead. The open terrain
stretches out, grass swaying in the breeze. The sky hangs vast overhead.

east.description: An open path leads to On A Road

west.description: An open path leads to On A Road

5618.name: On A Road
5618.description:
The area opens on a well maintained road leading east towards New Thalos
and west towards the Eastern Mountains. To the north Visible is wide
plains stretching out as far as the eye can see. to the South begins a
dark green forest. Wildflowers dot the landscape. The ground is soft
underfoot.

east.description: Outside The West Gate Of New Thalos

west.description: An open path leads to On A Road

5619.name: The Headwaters Of The River Of Lost Souls
5619.description:
This is the headwaters of what is oft called the darkest river in the
land. Looking at the swampy water pooling in this rocky valley, you can
see why the water downstream is so dark. The rock walls reach up around
you blocking all exits except that to the north up onto the banks, and
to the south where the river flows. The depths are dark and unknowable.
Spray mists the air around.

north.description: There is a small path leading away from the bank just to the north.

south.description: The waters of this swampy pool are flowing slowly towards the south.

5620.name: River Ishtar
5620.description:
The river calms a bit after being thrashed in the interior of the
mountain. Although still deep within the rocks Visible is faint traces
of green to the east. The water churns with dangerous currents. The
depths are dark and unknowable.

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near A Split In The River

5621.name: River Ishtar
5621.description:
The River Ishtar flows swiftly here, its waters dark and deep. Stone
embankments channel the current through the city, and Visible is bridges
spanning the river both upstream and downstream. The roar of water fills
your ears. The depths are dark and unknowable.

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5622.name: River Ishtar
5622.description:
The river begins its decent out of the mountains now and continues its
flow to the east. Spray mists the air around. The roar of water
fills your ears.

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5623.name: River Ishtar
5623.description:
The river flows under the wall of the city to the east and stretches off
towards high snow capped mountains far far to the west. The roar of
water fills your ears. The depths are dark and unknowable.

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5624.name: River Ishtar
5624.description:
The river flows out from the city down a long winding gully towards the
Sea of Dragons. To the to the south lies the Great Eastern Desert and
north a wide open expanse of grass. You can just barely make out a road
that seems to be traveling along side the river but the banks are to
steep for you to see very far. The roar of water fills your ears. Spray
mists the air around.

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5625.name: River Ishtar
5625.description:
The river continues its descent down the lowlands flowing ever so gently
south. It is hard to believe this is the same river that came cascading
down the mountainside. Waves crash and foam relentlessly. The roar of
water fills your ears.

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5626.name: River Ishtar
5626.description:
Small animals and herd animals can be heard in the distance, though you
don't actually see any near the river. Perhaps the steep slopes pervent
them from using the river. Spray mists the air around. Waves crash
and foam relentlessly.

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5627.name: The Edge Of The Ravine
5627.description:
The area opens at the edge of a really long drop down. A small rope
bridge has conviently been placed here to allow you access to the other
side of the bridge. Unfortunately the wind seems to be kicking up making
the bridge sway slightly. The path leads off through the mountains to
the east. Bare rock dominates the landscape. The path is steep and
treacherous.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Path Through The Mountains

west.description: An open path leads to On A Rope Bridge

5628.name: A Path Through The Mountains
5628.description:
The narrow path makes its way through the mountains east and west. You
hear the squawking of a large bird over head most likely a buzzard
waiting for you to drop. The path is steep and treacherous. Bare rock
dominates the landscape.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to A Path Through The Mountains

south.description: A rocky path climbs toward The Foothills

west.description: A steep trail ascends to The Edge Of The Ravine

5629.name: A Path Through The Mountains
5629.description:
A large boulder suddenly decides it wants to occupy the same space you
are currently standing in. Bare rock dominates the landscape. The path
is steep and treacherous.

east.description: On The Eastern Edge Of The Mountains

west.description: A steep trail ascends to A Path Through The Mountains

5630.name: On A Road
5630.description:
Paved stones form this section of road through Thalos. Buildings of
varying heights line the way, their architecture showing the city's long
history. Merchants and citizens go about their business around.
Sheep trails wind between the hillocks. The view stretches for miles in
every direction.

east.description: An open path leads to On A Road

west.description: A steep trail ascends to A Rocky Trail

5631.name: On A Road
5631.description:
The road continues through the city, well-traveled and maintained. Stone
buildings rise on either side, some showing their age, others more
recently constructed or renovated. The sounds of urban life surround
you. The air is fresh and clean. The ground is soft underfoot.

east.description: An open path leads to On A Road

west.description: A rocky path climbs toward On A Road

5632.name: On A Road
5632.description:
This stretch of road sees heavy foot traffic through Thalos. The paving
stones are worn smooth in the center where most people walk, while the
edges show the original chisel marks from when they were laid. Tall
grass sways in a gentle breeze. The air is fresh and clean.

east.description: An open path leads to On A Road

west.description: An open path leads to On A Road

5633.name: On A Road
5633.description:
The road bends here toward the riverbank giving access to the River
Ishtar. The road continues north and west from the river bank. The air
is fresh and clean. The ground is soft underfoot.

north.description: An open path leads to On A Road

south.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: An open path leads to On A Road

5634.name: The River Of Lost Souls
5634.description:
The river flows south through a valley in the mountains. Visible is a
small village to the west. Spray mists the air around. Waves crash and
foam relentlessly.

north.description: The Headwaters Of The River Of Lost Souls

south.description: Deep waters churn near The River Of Lost Souls

5635.name: The River Of Lost Souls
5635.description:
The river flows south in the southern end of this wide valley. The walls
of the valley close in to the south. The depths are dark and unknowable.
Spray mists the air around.

north.description: Deep waters churn near The River Of Lost Souls

south.description: Deep waters churn near The River Of Lost Souls

5636.name: The River Of Lost Souls
5636.description:
The river begins to speed up as it cascades down this mountain crevice.
High above a small rope bridge sways in the wind. The roar of water
fills your ears. The depths are dark and unknowable.

north.description: Deep waters churn near The River Of Lost Souls

south.description: Deep waters churn near The River Of Lost Souls

5637.name: The River Of Lost Souls
5637.description:
The river rapidly flows down this crack in the side of the mountain to
the south. Hopefully you will hear any aproaching rapids. Waves crash
and foam relentlessly. The water churns with dangerous currents.

north.description: Deep waters churn near The River Of Lost Souls

south.description: Deep waters churn near The River Of Lost Souls

5638.name: The River Of Lost Souls
5638.description:
The river seems to calm a bit as the crevase widens lessens its
stranglehold on the waters. The river continues to the north through a
crack and flows to the south. The roar of water fills your ears. Spray
mists the air around.

north.description: Deep waters churn near The River Of Lost Souls

south.description: Deep waters churn near A Split In The River

5639.name: A Split In The River
5639.description:
The waters of the river crash down upon a rock and split into two bodies
of water. The river you are on continues its southern course and the new
river heads off to the east. to the west you notice that the rocks have
split and crumbled as if torn asunder by some massive force. It looks
impossible to traverse. The River of Lost Souls also continues to the
north. The roar of water fills your ears. Waves crash and foam
relentlessly.

north.description: Deep waters churn near The River Of Lost Souls

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

south.description: Deep waters churn near The River Of Lost Souls

5640.name: The River Of Lost Souls
5640.description:
The river continues north and south from here through a water eroded
valley. Spray mists the air around. The roar of water fills your
ears.

north.description: Deep waters churn near A Split In The River

south.description: Deep waters churn near The River Of Lost Souls

5641.name: The River Of Lost Souls
5641.description:
The river continues north and south from here through a water eroded
valley. The water churns with dangerous currents. Waves crash and foam
relentlessly.

north.description: Deep waters churn near The River Of Lost Souls

south.description: Deep waters churn near The River Of Lost Souls

5642.name: The River Of Lost Souls
5642.description:
The river continues north and south from here through a water eroded
valley. The roar of water fills your ears. The depths are dark and
unknowable.

north.description: Deep waters churn near The River Of Lost Souls

south.description: Deep waters churn near The River Of Lost Souls

5643.name: The River Of Lost Souls
5643.description:
The river makes a sharp bend here and heads south into a large mountain
and north through a valley. On a ledge above, and to the west, you
can see movement. The depths are dark and unknowable. The water churns
with dangerous currents.

north.description: Deep waters churn near The River Of Lost Souls

south.description: Deep waters churn near A Tunnel Intersection

5644.name: River Ishtar
5644.description:
The river widens here, no longer bounded by rock, and flows east towards
a plain. Waves crash and foam relentlessly. The water churns with
dangerous currents.

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5645.name: River Ishtar
5645.description:
The river continues here east to east. There is a landing area to the
north where you can gain access to the shore. The depths are dark and
unknowable. The water churns with dangerous currents.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to A Rocky Trail

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5646.name: River Ishtar
5646.description:
The river meanders through the foothills of the eastern mountains. The
air is dryer on this side of the continental divide and it seems a bit
warmer. The water churns with dangerous currents. Waves crash and foam
relentlessly.

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5647.name: River Ishtar
5647.description:
The river continues its journey eastward flowing through the plains. To
the west you see the peaks of large snow capped mountains and to the
east you see the outline of a large city. The depths are dark and
unknowable. Waves crash and foam relentlessly.

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5648.name: River Ishtar
5648.description:
The mighty River Ishtar dominates this view, its waters flowing
powerfully through the heart of Thalos. The riverbank is reinforced with
fitted stones, and Visible is boats and barges plying the current. Waves
crash and foam relentlessly. Spray mists the air around.

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5649.name: River Ishtar
5649.description:
The river slows as it widens and meanders through the lowlands. A small
dock give access to the north shore. The water churns with dangerous
currents. The depths are dark and unknowable.

north.description: An open path leads to On A Road

east.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5651.name: In The Mountains
5651.description:
The way continues over rocks and stones through the mountains between
the Ishtar and Dark rivers. It is funny how all the rocks look alike.
Snow clings to shadowed crevices. The air is thin and cold at this
altitude.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

east.description: A passage leads to In The Mountains

south.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

west.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

5652.name: In The Mountains
5652.description:
The way continues over rocks and stones through the mountains between
the Ishtar and Dark rivers. It is funny how all the rocks look alike.
Snow clings to shadowed crevices. Bare rock dominates the landscape.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

east.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

south.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

west.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

5653.name: In The Mountains
5653.description:
The way continues over rocks and stones through the mountains between
the Ishtar and Dark rivers. It is funny how all the rocks look alike.
Snow clings to shadowed crevices. The air is thin and cold at this
altitude.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

east.description: You see a large boulder blocking your path.

south.description: A passage leads to In The Mountains

west.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

5654.name: In The Mountains
5654.description:
The way continues over rocks and stones through the mountains between
the Ishtar and Dark rivers. It is funny how all the rocks look alike.
Snow clings to shadowed crevices. The wind howls around exposed peaks.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

east.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

south.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

west.description: Deep waters churn near The Headwaters Of The Dark River

5655.name: In The Mountains
5655.description:
The way continues over rocks and stones through the mountains between
the Ishtar and Dark rivers. It is funny how all the rocks look alike.
The wind howls around exposed peaks. Snow clings to shadowed crevices.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

east.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

south.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

west.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

5656.name: In The Mountains
5656.description:
The way continues over rocks and stones through the mountains between
the Ishtar and Dark rivers. It is funny how all the rocks look alike.
The ceiling hangs low overhead. Shadows gather in the corners.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

east.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

south.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

west.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

5657.name: In The Mountains
5657.description:
The way continues over rocks and stones through the mountains between
the Ishtar and Dark rivers. It is funny how all the rocks look alike.
Bare rock dominates the landscape. The path is steep and treacherous.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

east.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

south.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

west.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

5658.name: In The Mountains
5658.description:
The way continues over rocks and stones through the mountains between
the Ishtar and Dark rivers. It is funny how all the rocks look alike.
The path is steep and treacherous. The air is thin and cold at this
altitude.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

east.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

south.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

west.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

5659.name: In The Mountains
5659.description:
The way continues over rocks and stones through the mountains between
the Ishtar and Dark rivers. It is funny how all the rocks look alike.
Snow clings to shadowed crevices. The path is steep and treacherous.

north.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

east.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

south.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

west.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

5660.name: The Headwaters Of The Dark River
5660.description:
A large natural spring issues forth from the heart of the mountain and
flows west down the mountain. It looks like there was a terrible
earthquake here not too long ago, and a path that leads eastwards
through the mountains is covered with rocks, making passage difficult.
Spray mists the air around. The depths are dark and unknowable.

east.description: A steep trail ascends to In The Mountains

west.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

5661.name: On The Dark River
5661.description:
The river flows down the mountain through a large crevasse to the west
and up into the mountains east. Waves crash and foam relentlessly. The
depths are dark and unknowable.

east.description: Deep waters churn near The Headwaters Of The Dark River

west.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

5662.name: On The Dark River
5662.description:
The walls of this canyon tower overhead as the river continues east and
west from here. The water churns with dangerous currents. The roar of
water fills your ears.

east.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

west.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

5663.name: On The Dark River
5663.description:
The walls of rock around slowly shrink to ground level as the river
flows out of the mountains and onto the plains. The water churns with
dangerous currents. The roar of water fills your ears.

east.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

west.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

5664.name: On The Dark River
5664.description:
The river continues east and west from here out of the foothills to the
east down into the mountains south of here. The roar of water fills your
ears. Waves crash and foam relentlessly.

east.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

south.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

5665.name: On The Dark River
5665.description:
The river, following a low spot in the foothills, bends and twists. Tall
mountains can be seen off to the south and east. Waves crash and foam
relentlessly. Spray mists the air around.

north.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

south.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

5666.name: On The Dark River
5666.description:
The river makes a wide sweeping turn here into the mountain. The water
churns with dangerous currents. Spray mists the air around. Treacherous
currents swirl through the water. The depths are dark and dangerous.

north.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

west.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

5667.name: On The Dark River
5667.description:
The river flows west from here into the heart of the mountain and east
towards the foothills once more. The water churns with dangerous
currents. The roar of water fills your ears.

east.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

west.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

5668.name: On The Dark River
5668.description:
You can barely make out what is ahead as the river flows quietly
through the passageway. The depths are dark and unknowable. Spray mists
the air around.

east.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

south.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

5669.name: On The Dark River
5669.description:
The river slowly flows west towards the heart of the mountain. There are
small cracks in the passage wall to the north where you might be able to
get up out of the water. Spray mists the air around. The roar of
water fills your ears.

north.description: An open path leads to On A Small Ledge

east.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

west.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

5670.name: On The Dark River
5670.description:
The river continues east and west from here flowing south of a dark
ledge high above the water level. The depths are dark and unknowable.
Waves crash and foam relentlessly.

east.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

west.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

5671.name: On The Dark River
5671.description:
The river flows south through a narrowing part of the passage as it
progresses deeper into the mountain. The roar of water fills your ears.
Waves crash and foam relentlessly.

east.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

south.description: Deep waters churn near An Underground Lake

5672.name: On A Small Ledge
5672.description:
You clamber out of the water up onto this narrow ledge to see if it
leads deeper into the mountain. Unfortunately, the ledge is only wide
enough to rest upon for a while and there does not appear to be any
other exits other than rejoining the underground river. Tall grass sways
in a gentle breeze. Wildflowers dot the landscape.

south.description: Deep waters churn near On The Dark River

5681.name: On The Plains
5681.description:
The area opens on an open expanse of grass extending in all directions.
To the to the south stand the might northern gates of New Thalos. East
and to the west the grassy fields continue and north, in the distance,
you see a line of trees. Tall grass sways in a gentle breeze. The ground
is soft underfoot.

north.description: An open path leads to On The Plains

east.description: An open path leads to On The Plains

south.description: Outside The Northern Gate Of New Thalos

west.description: An open path leads to On The Plains

5682.name: On The Plains
5682.description:
The area opens on an open field of grass. The forest to the north is
closer but still a good distance away. To the south a small dirt path
has been trodden into the ground heading towards New Thalos. Tall grass
sways in a gentle breeze. Wildflowers dot the landscape.

north.description: An open path leads to The Edge Of The Forest

east.description: An open path leads to On The Plains

south.description: An open path leads to On The Plains

west.description: An open path leads to On The Plains

5683.name: The Edge Of The Forest
5683.description:
The area opens at the edge of a huge forest. The line of trees continues
as far as the eye can see to the east and west. A large expanse of grass
spreads out to the south. The air is fresh and clean. Wildflowers dot
the landscape.

north.description: An ancient forest beckons to the north.

east.description: The plains continue to the east.

south.description: The open plains stretch to the south.

west.description: The plains continue to the west.

5684.name: River Ishtar
5684.description:
The river broadens even more here and the waters become murky. The smell
of saltwater has reached you from the east. The Dragon Sea cannot be far
away. To the east Visible is the faint outline of a city and to the
north you see a large expanse of grass. Waves crash and foam
relentlessly. The roar of water fills your ears.

east.description: Deep waters churn near The River Delta

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5685.name: The River Delta
5685.description:
This is where the river empties out into the Dragon Sea. The backrush of
water has kicked up a lot of sand and the blue sea is stained where the
river empties. Looking west all Visible is is water... all the way to
the horizon. North of here is a small dock you think you should be able
to reach with out too much trouble. The river stretches off to the west
back towards New Thalos. The roar of water fills your ears. Spray mists
the air around.

east.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

west.description: Deep waters churn near River Ishtar

5686.name: The Dragon Sea
5686.description:
The area is the clear blue seas of the Dragon Sea. Water extends in all
directions as far as the eye can see. Off in the distance you think you
might see a small dock to the north. Spray mists the air around. The
roar of water fills your ears.

north.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

east.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

south.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

west.description: Deep waters churn near The River Delta

5687.name: The Dragon Sea
5687.description:
The Dragon Sea comes up along the shore here. The deep blue waters
rolling in and crashing against the beach. To the north you see a small
dock jutting out into the surf. Spray mists the air around. The
depths are dark and unknowable.

north.description: The cobblestones lead to On A Dock

east.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

south.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

5688.name: The Dragon Sea
5688.description:
The area is the clear blue seas of the Dragon Sea. Water extends in all
directions as far as the eye can see. Off in the distance you think you
might see a small dock to the west. Waves crash and foam relentlessly.
The roar of water fills your ears.

north.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

east.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

south.description: The cobblestones lead to On A Dock

5689.name: The Dragon Sea
5689.description:
The area is the clear blue seas of the Dragon Sea. Water extends in all
directions as far as the eye can see. Off in the distance you think you
might see a small dock to the west. The roar of water fills your ears.
The water churns with dangerous currents.

north.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

east.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

south.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

west.description: The cobblestones lead to On A Dock

down.description: Deep waters churn near Under The dock

5690.name: On A Road
5690.description:
The people of New Thalos take great pride in the services their city may
provide. One of these services is the construction crews the go to great
lengths to keep all the roads in order. Although the taxes in New Thalos
are higher then other cities in the realm most of the money is used for
the good of the people. The ground is soft underfoot. The air is fresh
and clean.

east.description: An open path leads to On A Road

west.description: Outside The Eastern Gate Of New Thalos

5691.name: On A Road
5691.description:
You walk along a well used road with beautiful scenery. To the north
tall pine trees form a wall that goes on for miles. Between the road and
the trees lies a great expanse of grassy plains. South of here, beyond
the river, lies the Great Eastern Desert. The road continues east and
west. Wildflowers dot the landscape. Tall grass sways in a gentle
breeze.

east.description: An open path leads to On A Road

west.description: An open path leads to On A Road

5692.name: On A Road
5692.description:
The Dragon Sea can be seen to the east now spreading out to unknown
lands. The road continues east and west. To the south you hear the
sounds of boats traveling the River Ishtar delivering goods. The open
sky stretches overhead. Wildflowers dot the landscape.

east.description: An open path leads to On A Road

west.description: An open path leads to On A Road

5693.name: On A Road
5693.description:
This is the man land route through the land. Merchants can bring their
goods to the coastline and have them ferried onto ships for export.
Travel by foot west will take you through New Thalos up and over the
Eastern Mountains and down into Midgaard. The open sky stretches
overhead. Wildflowers dot the landscape.

east.description: An open path leads to Near The Shore

west.description: An open path leads to On A Road

5694.name: Near The Shore
5694.description:
The road ends here turning into a small dirt path leading down the beach
and onto a dock. To the north and south you see the coastline stretching
out before. West of here the lowlands roll up into huge snow capped
mountains. The air is fresh and clean. The ground is soft underfoot.

east.description: The cobblestones lead to On A Dock

west.description: An open path leads to On A Road

5695.name: On A Dock
5695.description:
The area opens on a simple wooden dock that acts as an extension of the
road to the west. The dock seems to have been here for quite a long time
but is still sturdy. A small ladder has been built on the eastern end to
allow easy access to and from ships. The cobblestones are worn smooth by
countless feet. The sounds of city life echo around.

north.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

east.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

south.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

west.description: An open path leads to Near The Shore

5696.name: The Dragon Sea
5696.description:
The area is the clear blue seas of the Dragon Sea. Water extends in all
directions as far as the eye can see. Off in the distance you think you
might see a small dock to the west. Waves crash and foam relentlessly.
Spray mists the air around.

north.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

east.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

west.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

5697.name: The Dragon Sea
5697.description:
The ocean spreads out in all directions rolling gently. In the distance
Visible is an island on the horizon. To the west you see the mainland.
Spray mists the air around. The roar of water fills your ears.

north.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

east.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

south.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

west.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

5698.name: Under The dock
5698.description:
The area is swiming underneath the dock. Visible is the four wooden
pylons that support the structure. The murky water clouds you vision as
you gaze westward, but you think you can make out an iron grating in
that direction. The water churns with dangerous currents. Waves crash
and foam relentlessly.

west.description: Deep waters churn near The Lair Of The Ixitxachitl

up.description: Deep waters churn near The Dragon Sea

5699.name: The Lair Of The Ixitxachitl
5699.description:
Blood swirls around in the water as the Ixitxachitl devours the last of
its meal. Swirling around quickly as you intrude upon his meal the large
sting ray attacks! Spray mists the air around. The depths are dark
and unknowable.

east.description: Deep waters churn near Under The dock

5400.name: mage
5400.description: An old man peering through ancient tomes rests here.

5401.name: cleric
5401.description: An older man wrapped in purple, long-flowing robes meditates here.

5402.name: warrior
5402.description: A smaller man dressed in black robes stands here waiting to train you.

5403.name: thief
5403.description:
A small human dressed in black rests in the corner.  As you enter he grabs
a knife and throws it at you.  It lands in the wall next to your left ear.
'We will now begin', is all he says.

5404.name: receptionist
5404.long_desc: A dark skinned, veiled woman greets you from behind the desk.
5404.description:
This Arabian beauty is obviously the daughter of some high ranking
official.  As you attempt to sneak a peek under her veil you notice
a small moon-shaped birthmark on her left cheek.

5405.name: bartender
5405.long_desc: An old withered man leans against the bar.
5405.description: He looks distracted as he pours five drinks at once without error.

5406.name: john
5406.long_desc: Brother John, lead singer for the Lokettes stands on stage.
5406.description:
You see the lead singer of the Lokettes lip synching to an old Zochan
tune.

5407.name: panhandler
5407.description: A small skinny man rests here hoping to find a warm heart.

5408.name: panhandler
5408.description: A small skinny man rests here staring at your clothes.

5409.name: beggar
5409.long_desc: A grubby beggar sits here in the filth.
5409.description: This poor soul seems down on his luck, perhaps you might spare a dime?

5410.name: baker
5410.long_desc: The baker stands here playing solitaire.
5410.description: You see a large man in a white apron covered in flour from head to toe.

5411.name: shopkeeper
5411.description: You see a half-elf sitting on a stool behind his counter.

5412.name: banker
5412.long_desc: A banker stands here waiting to help you.
5412.description: This small halfling seems adept at counting money.

5413.name: ahkeem
5413.long_desc: Ahkeem the tailor welcomes you to his store.
5413.description:
This middle-aged man looks over you with disdain and quickly suggests a
new wardrobe.

5414.name: vera
5414.long_desc: Vera the veggie lady beems as you look over her stand.
5414.description: A tall slender woman stands before you smiling broadly.

5415.name: butch
5415.long_desc: Butch the meatcutter stands here in his bloodied apron.
5415.description:
This stocky dwarf has a mad glint in his eye as he twirls his clever
carelessly into the air.

5416.name: abdul
5416.long_desc: Abdul stands here, waiting to help you.
5416.description:
Abdul returns your gaze with a steady eye.  You quickly glance away
under his cold stare and place your order.

5417.name: igor
5417.description: You see a small dwarf with a large hump on his left shoulder.

5418.name: cassandra
5418.long_desc: Cassandra stands proudly over her selection.
5418.description:
You see a happy weather-worn face whose lines suggest many years on
the open sea.  It is only through years of fishing that she is able
to withstand the smell that permeates the air.

5419.name: foreman
5419.long_desc: The foreman stands here screaming at the workers.
5419.description:
A worried working dwarf stands here constantly making notes in his
book and looking at his watch.

5420.name: construction
5420.long_desc: A construction worker steadily works here.
5420.description: A large sweaty looking man doesn't even return your glance.

5421.name: statue
5421.long_desc: The statue of Brahman stands here.
5421.description:
The statue made of solid marble depicts the mighty God defeating Siva
in magical combat.

5422.name: statue
5422.long_desc: The statue of Siva stands here.
5422.description:
The statue of the High Lord of Destruction stands here beings attacked
by Brahman in magical combat.

5423.name: statue
5423.long_desc: The statue of Indra stands here.
5423.description: This statue looks like an enormous elephant.

5424.name: statue
5424.long_desc: The statue of Yama stands here.
5424.description: This is a statue of the God of Death.  It is covered with odd runes.

5425.name: statue
5425.long_desc: The statue of Surya stands here.
5425.description:
The statue of Surya, the God in charge of the Sun, almost glows
with a firey aura.

5426.name: statue
5426.long_desc: The statue of Kali stands here.
5426.description:
The statue of the Black Mother, Kali, is made of black marble and
is covered with silver runes.

5427.name: statue
5427.long_desc: The statue of Brihaspati stands here.
5427.description:
The statue of Brihaspati, the God of Scholars and Knowledge is made
of a weathered marble.

5428.name: statue
5428.long_desc: The statue of Puchan stands here.
5428.description:
The statue of Puchan, God of Travellers, is covered with dust and worn
as if it had been dragged a long way down a dusty road.

5429.name: aziz
5429.long_desc: Aziz the Human Canon stands here.
5429.description: This big and burly man grins at you as he draws his sword.

5430.name: mustafah
5430.long_desc: Mustafah the Human Robber stands here.
5430.description: This man is lithe and has an evil smirk upon his face.

5431.name: fatima
5431.long_desc: Fatima the Elven Invoker stands here.
5431.description:
This female elf has dusky skin and black hair.  A combination you don't
see very often on elves.

5432.name: kareem
5432.long_desc: Kareem the Dwarven Mercenary stands here.
5432.description: This short stocky fellow has a chest the girth of a barrel.

5433.name: nomad
5433.long_desc: A nomad merchant looks you over.
5433.description:
This robust fellow returns your gaze with a smile, but something inside
tells you not to trust him very far.

5434.name: bodyguard
5434.description: The large half-orc quickly glances you over and returns to his duties.

5435.name: kid
5435.description: This small child sees you looking at him and quickly looks away.

5436.name: dockworker
5436.long_desc: A strong dockworker walks by moving crates.
5436.description:
Although seemingly dull witted, this hulking mass carries the huge
crates from the boats like it was a box of lilies.

5437.name: man
5437.long_desc: A small man walks around scribbling in a notebook.
5437.description:
The city's taxcollextor walks from store to store collecting the
Sultan's fee for living in his grand city.

5439.name: chulainn
5439.description:
This large man does not seem to be surprised at your approach and
looks at you quizically.

5440.name: daghdha
5440.description: This man is dressed in long brown robes and has a penetrating gaze.

5442.name: man
5442.long_desc: A small grey-haired man walks around spouting gospel.
5442.description:
This sad case may have been an evangelist in another lifetime. He is known
to stand on corners and accost passers-by with his doomsday preaching.

5443.name: alley
5443.long_desc: A small harmless feline searches for food.
5443.description: You see a small starved cat.

5444.name: vulture
5444.description: As you look up at this bird, you see the only thing it wants is a corpse.

5445.name: old
5445.long_desc: An old man sits here playing chess.

5446.name: lugh
5446.long_desc: Lugh the Librarian sits behind a desk.
5446.description: The huge hulking mass rises as someone asks him a question.

5447.name: dirt
5447.long_desc: The wind kicks up some dust.
5447.description: What you see before you is really a baby air elemental.

5448.name: lamia
5448.long_desc: A strange lamia stands here waiting for her next meal.
5448.description:
This is a creature with the upper torso of a beautiful woman, but the
lower body of a four-legged beast.  She licks her lips as she looks at
you greedily.

5449.name: dervish
5449.description: This man looks like he could use a lot of rest.

5450.name: sultan
5450.long_desc: The Sultan rests here on his throne.
5450.description: You see a large wealthy man in red robes smiling at you.

5451.name: harem
5451.long_desc: A lovely, veiled harem girl stands here.
5451.description:
You see a dark skinned beauty, wearing almost transparent silks and 
light blue veil.  Her loyalty to the Sultan is unwavering.

5452.name: jailer
5452.long_desc: The Jailer sleeps here, snoring loudly.
5452.description:
You see a pathetic soul lying here.  Probably some ex-nobleman that has
fallen out of grace with the Sultan.

5453.name: eunich
5453.long_desc: A eunich stands here watching over the girls.
5453.description:
You see a large man whose only duty is to protect the harem.  He has been
castrated for the ladies' safety.

5454.name: sultans
5454.long_desc: Nichole, the Sultan's favorite girl rests on a mound of pillows.
5454.description:
You see the most beautiful Arabian girl that has ever meet your eyes.
Too bad she is about to kill you.

5456.name: mage
5456.long_desc: The Guard for the Guild of Mages stand here.
5456.description: This man looks like a mage/warrior, I wouldn't mess with him.

5457.name: cleric
5457.long_desc: The Guard for the Guild of Clerics stands here.
5457.description: This man looks like a cleric/warrior, I wouldn't mess with him.

5458.name: warrior
5458.long_desc: The Guard for the Guild of Warriors stands here.
5458.description: The man looks like Conan's cousin, I wouldn't mess with him.

5459.name: thief
5459.long_desc: The Guard for the Guild of theives stands here.
5459.description:
You see a thief dressed all in black, he quickly stands as you
enter and steps to bar your way.  You notice his hands resting
on two sheathes.

5460.name: servant
5460.long_desc: A servant boy is here running errands.
5460.description: You see a small boy running around the halls of the palace.

5461.name: sultans
5461.long_desc: A guard stands here, protecting the innocent.
5461.description: You see a trained fighter, ready to help those in need.

5462.name: sultans
5462.long_desc: A guard stands here, watching the gate.
5462.description: You see a trained fighter, ready to defend the city.

5463.name: sultans
5463.long_desc: The Chief of the Sultan's Guard stands here.
5463.description: You see a large man skilled in hunting and killing.

5464.name: mercenary
5464.long_desc: A mercenary stands here waiting for a job.
5464.description: You see an assassin down on his luck looking to be freelanced out.

5465.name: shipwright
5465.long_desc: An old captain rests here carving on a stick.
5465.description:
You see the shipwright of New Thalos, waiting to make someone a boat.  He
beams a smile at you through his beard as you walk in.

5466.name: blacksmith
5466.long_desc: The blacksmith stands here pumping air into his fire.
5466.description:
You see a large human, dripping in sweat, standing before you.  He takes
a break from his swealtering work to bid you welcome.

5467.name: horse
5467.description: You see one of the fine Arabian beasts known about the land.

5468.name: tourist
5468.long_desc: A tourist stands here looking lost.
5468.description:
You see a small, rotund man, with a strange object around his neck and
a nose guard.  He is looking at a small map that he seems to be holding
upside down.

5469.name: ixitxachitl
5469.long_desc: A very large ray with a wicked looking tail swims here.
5469.description: You see a large ray with sharp fangs and a barbed tail.

5470.name: cryohydra
5470.description: A grey-brown reptillian creature with amber eyes stands before you.

5471.name: minotaur
5471.description: A huge lizard like reptile with horns like a minotaur.

5472.name: dog
5472.description: A large two-headed hound barks at you vicously.

5473.name: lion
5473.description: A large fierce dapple skinned lion glares at you.

5474.name: behir
5474.long_desc: A behir slithers on the ground.
5474.description: You see a large snake-like reptile with more than a dozen legs.

5475.name: chimera
5475.long_desc: A creature with three heads: lion, goat, and dragon stands here.
5475.description:
The chimera is still a mystery, better left unexplored.  This creature
has the hindquarters of a goat, the forepaws of a lion and the body of
a red dragon.

5476.name: couatl
5476.description:
A beautiful creature with the body of a serpent and feathered wings the
colour of the rainbow.

5477.name: giant
5477.description: It is a hornet, what else can be said?

5478.name: pegasus
5478.long_desc: The pegasus stands here, flexing its wings.
5478.description:
A magnificant winged steed, this horse looks much like the Arabian
thoroughbreds you have seen in stables.

5479.name: elriva
5479.long_desc: Elriva stands here mixing a love potion.
5479.description:
You see a very healthy female dressed in black, with long flowing
hair to match her outfit.

5480.name: braheem
5480.long_desc: Braheem stands here talking to the walls.
5480.description: You see a powerful but slighty insane mage.

5481.name: high
5481.long_desc: The high priest rests here meditating, well he WAS meditating.
5481.description: He does NOT look real happy that you have disturbed him.

5482.name: royal
5482.long_desc: An Elite Royal Guard stands here smiling happily.
5482.description:
You see one of the Royal Guards of New Thalos who seems to have undergone
some heavy training.

5483.name: patch
5483.long_desc: A large half-orc with a patch over one eye pours beer behind the counter.
5483.description:
You see a really big guy here who seems to have lost an eye in one manner
or another.

5484.name: stitch
5484.long_desc: Stitch, the leather dude reclines in his chair.
5484.description:
You see a small hobbit with his feet kicked up on his desk waiting for
some sucker, uhm, customer to walk in his store.

5485.name: gardener
5485.long_desc: A small elf stands here tending the garden.
5485.description:
A young elf stands here in dirt covered overalls.  He seems to be
weeding his garden.

5486.name: nightmare
5486.long_desc: A large horse, black as night, stands here.
5486.description:
You see the largest horse you have ever seen before.  Standing 10'
at the shoulder it breathes flame from his nostrils and leaps to
attack you.

5487.name: wolverine
5487.long_desc: A large wolf like creature leaps out from the darkness.
5487.description:
You see a half wolf, half human beast wearing a glove with long thin
blades on it.

5488.name: mimic
5488.long_desc: You see an incredibly life-like painting of the Sultan's mother.

5489.name: mayor
5489.long_desc: The Mayor of New Thalos stands here.
5489.description: You see a chubby rabbit dressed in his best suit.

5490.name: chef
5490.long_desc: The chef stands here making dinner.
5490.description: You see a very large human who seems to taste everything he makes.

5400.name: palace
5400.short_desc: the palace key of New Thalos
5400.room_desc: A large key bearing the crest of New Thalos lies here.

5401.name: city
5401.short_desc: the Key to the City of New Thalos
5401.room_desc: The heavy city key lies here in the dust

5402.name: fountain
5402.room_desc: The large central fountain domintating the central square rests here.

5403.name: morningstar
5403.room_desc: A small spiked metal ball connected to a rod by links of chain lies here.

5406.name: corbin
5406.room_desc: A bec de corbin lies here.

5412.name: sword
5412.room_desc: A two handed bastard sword lies here.

5415.name: suit
5415.room_desc: A suit of banded mail lies here.

5417.name: suit
5417.room_desc: A suit of field plate lies here.

5418.name: suit
5418.room_desc: A suit of ringmail lies here.

5419.name: suit
5419.room_desc: A suit of splintmail aromr lies here.

5424.name: sleeves
5424.room_desc: A pair of leather sleeves lies here.

5426.name: pants
5426.room_desc: A pair of leather pants lies here.

5427.name: gloves
5427.room_desc: A pair of leather gloves lies here.

5428.name: boots
5428.short_desc: a pair of padded leather boots
5428.room_desc: A pair of padded leather boots lies here.

5429.name: jacket
5429.room_desc: A studded leather jacket lies here.

5430.name: sleeves
5430.short_desc: a pair of studded leather sleeves
5430.room_desc: A pair of studded leather sleeves lie here.

5431.name: pants
5431.short_desc: a pair of studded leather pants
5431.room_desc: A pair of studded leather pants lie here.

5432.name: gloves
5432.short_desc: a pair of studded leather gloves
5432.room_desc: A pair of studded leather gloves lie here.

5440.name: cheese
5440.room_desc: A hunk of cheese lies here.

5443.name: rations
5443.room_desc: A tin of iron rations lies here.

5445.name: nuts
5445.room_desc: Some nuts lie scatterd on the ground.

5446.name: belt
5446.room_desc: A nicely made belt lies here.

5447.name: boots
